the end or last part of something

sentences.english: a familiar tune
sentences.chinese: 熟悉的曲调

sentences.english: It was a relief to be back in familiar surroundings .
sentences.chinese: 回到熟悉的环境里让人松了一口气。

sentences.english: Beggars on the street are becoming a familiar sight .
sentences.chinese: 街上出现乞丐的情况逐渐变得屡见不鲜。

sentences.english: This kind of situation was all too familiar (= very familiar ) to John.
sentences.chinese: 这种情形对约翰来说太熟悉了。

sentences.english: Her face seems vaguely familiar , but I can’t quite place her.
sentences.chinese: 她看起来有点面熟，但我还是认不出她来。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is familiar is well-known to you and easy to recognize

sentences.english: The warehouse was completely destroyed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 仓库全给烧毁了。

sentences.english: Thirty people died in a fire in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 30人死于芝加哥市中心的一场火灾。

sentences.english: Police think that the fire was started deliberately.
sentences.chinese: 警方认为有人故意纵火。

sentences.english: Rioters set fire to a whole row of stores (= made them start burning ) .
sentences.chinese: 暴徒纵火焚烧了一整排商店。

sentences.english: Soldiers fired on the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 士兵朝人群开枪。

detailed_translations.english: uncontrolled flames, light, and heat that destroy and damage things
to shoot bullets or bombs

sentences.english: Do you know the family next door?
sentences.chinese: 你认识隔壁那家人吗？

sentences.english: The Webb family still has its farm over there.
sentences.chinese: 韦伯家依然保留着那里的农场。

sentences.english: The family now live in London.
sentences.chinese: 那家人现居伦敦。

sentences.english: This house isn’t big enough for a family of seven.
sentences.chinese: 这房子住不下七口之家。

sentences.english: My family come from Scotland originally.
sentences.chinese: 我祖籍是苏格兰。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people who are related to each other, especially a mother, a father, and their children

sentences.english: Would you like to be a fireman?
sentences.chinese: 你愿意是一名消防队员吗？

sentences.english: Why would you like to be a fireman?
sentences.chinese: 为什么你愿意是一名消防队员？

sentences.english: When people asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up, I never said fireman or astronaut.
sentences.chinese: 每当有人来问我长大了要做什麽，我从来不会说消防员或是宇航员什麽的。

detailed_translations.english: a man whose job is to stop fires burning

sentences.english: a famous actor
sentences.chinese: 著名演员

sentences.english: Many famous people have stayed in the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 许多名人都曾下榻这家酒店。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark (= a famous place or building that is easy to recognize ) .
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔是著名的地标。

sentences.english: Da Vinci’s world-famous portrait of the Mona Lisa
sentences.chinese: 达•芬奇的那幅闻名世界的肖像画《蒙娜丽莎》

detailed_translations.english: known about by many people in many places

sentences.english: a New Year’s Eve fireworks display
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜的烟火表演

sentences.english: Jeff and David were in the back yard setting off fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 杰夫和戴维在后院放烟花。

detailed_translations.english: a small container filled with powder that burns or explodes to produce coloured lights and noise in the sky

sentences.english: Groups of football fans began heading towards the ground.
sentences.chinese: 成群结队的球迷开始向球场走去。

detailed_translations.english: someone who likes a particular sport or performing art very much, or who admires a famous person

sentences.english: These results are firsts in the history of women’s athletics.
sentences.chinese: 这些成绩在女运动员历史上是第一次。

sentences.english: First I had to decide what to wear.
sentences.chinese: 首先我得决定穿什么。

detailed_translations.english: 1st

sentences.english: You look fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 你看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: It’s a fantastic place, really beautiful!
sentences.chinese: 这真是个好地方，漂亮极了！

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的， 极出色的， 了不起的； 极大的； 难以相信的； 异想天开的， 不实际的； 奇异的， 古怪的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good, attractive, enjoyable etc

sentences.english: Over 1,500 different species of fish inhabit the waters around the reef.
sentences.chinese: 那片礁石周围的水域生活着1,500多种不同的鱼类。

sentences.english: The stonefish is the most deadly of all fishes.
sentences.chinese: 石鱼是所有鱼类中毒性最强的。

sentences.english: You usually drinks white wine with fish.
sentences.chinese: 白葡萄酒一般配鱼喝

sentences.english: Dad really loves to fish.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸很喜欢钓鱼。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that lives in water, and uses its fins and tail to swim
to try to catch fish

sentences.english: We can walk to my house from here. It isn’t far.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以从这里步行去我家，不远。

sentences.english: You could see the mountains in the far distance.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到远处的群山。

sentences.english: Since I changed jobs, I have to travel further to get to work.
sentences.chinese: 我换了工作，上班更远了。

detailed_translations.english: a long distance away

sentences.chinese: 阿尔加维对河边的垂钓者或深海的渔民都是一个天堂。

detailed_translations.english: someone who catches fish as a sport or as a job

sentences.english: a 300-hectare farm
sentences.chinese: 一座300公顷的农场

sentences.english: farm workers
sentences.chinese: 农场工人

sentences.english: farm animals
sentences.chinese: 农场牲畜

sentences.english: Joe had worked on the farm all his life.
sentences.chinese: 乔在农场干了一辈子。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land used for growing crops or keeping animals

sentences.english: The sash, kimono, and other garments were made to fit a child.
sentences.chinese: 这些腰带、和服和其他衣服都做得适合孩子穿。

detailed_translations.english: to put a piece of equipment into a place, or a new part onto a machine, so that it is ready to be used
if something fits another thing, it is similar to it or suitable for it

sentences.english: She dickered with the farmer for the best fruit.
sentences.chinese: 她要买最好的水果而跟农民讨价还价。

sentences.english: The farmer peddled his fruit from house to house.
sentences.chinese: 那个农民挨家挨户兜售他的水果。

sentences.english: As a farmer, you should learn how to yoke the oxen together.
sentences.chinese: 作为农民，你应该学会怎样把一对牛用轭连起来。

sentences.english: The interest rate has been fixed at 6.5%.
sentences.chinese: 利率已经定为6.5%。

sentences.english: The shelves should be fixed to the wall with screws.
sentences.chinese: 架子应当用螺丝固定在墙上。

detailed_translations.english: to decide on a limit for something, especially prices, costs etc, so that they do not change

sentences.english: Their music will never go out of fashion (= stop being fashionable ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的音乐永不过时。

sentences.english: Please leave the building in an orderly fashion.
sentences.chinese: 请大家有秩序地离开大楼。

sentences.english: Perhaps they could sit down and discuss things in a civilised fashion.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们可以坐下来心平气和地商量事情。

sentences.english: She will be working out her problems in her own fashion (= in the way that she usually does this ) .
sentences.chinese: 她会以自己的方式来解决她的问题。

detailed_translations.english: something that is popular or thought to be good at a particular time

sentences.english: Children waving flags greeted the Russian leader.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们挥舞着旗帜，欢迎俄罗斯领导人。

sentences.english: the flag of Kenya
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亚国旗

sentences.english: the Spanish flag
sentences.chinese: 西班牙国旗

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth with a coloured pattern or picture on it that represents a country or organization

sentences.english: a fast car
sentences.chinese: 速度很快的汽车

sentences.english: That can’t be the time - my watch must be fast.
sentences.chinese: 不可能是这个时间——一定是我的表快了。

sentences.english: Slow down – you’re driving too fast.
sentences.chinese: 慢点——你开得太快了。

detailed_translations.english: moving or able to move quickly
moving quickly

sentences.chinese: 这张床可以折扁存放。

sentences.english: He lay flat on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他平躺在地板上。

sentences.english: That night I lay flat on my back and stared up at the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 那一夜，我仰面平躺，眼睛直直地盯着天花板。

detailed_translations.english: in a position in which the surface of something is against another surface without curving or sloping

detailed_translations.chinese: 平的；固定的；漏气的；单调的，沉闷的；浅的
detailed_translations.english: smooth and level, without raised or hollow areas, and not sloping or curving
a place for people to live that consists of a set of rooms that are part of a larger building

sentences.chinese: 你是不是在说我太胖了？

sentences.english: a short fat man in his early fifties
sentences.chinese: 一个五十岁出头的矮胖男人

sentences.chinese: 如果你把那些巧克力都吃了，就会变胖的。

sentences.english: He looks much fatter than in his photo.
sentences.chinese: 他看上去比相片上胖多了。

detailed_translations.english: weighing too much because you have too much flesh on your body

sentences.english: The village was cut off by floods.
sentences.chinese: 那个村子因洪水而与外界中断了联系。

sentences.english: the worst floods for over fifty years
sentences.chinese: 五十多年来最严重的水灾

sentences.chinese: 全国各地的城镇都被淹没了。

detailed_translations.english: a very large amount of water that covers an area that is usually dry

sentences.english: Ask your father to help you.
sentences.chinese: 叫你父亲帮你。

sentences.english: Andrew was very excited about becoming a father.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁初为人父，非常激动。

sentences.english: I have sinned, Father.
sentences.chinese: 我有罪，神父。

sentences.english: Freud is the father of psychoanalysis.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德是精神分析之父。

detailed_translations.english: a male parent

sentences.english: a polished wooden floor
sentences.chinese: 上过蜡的木地板

sentences.english: a puddle of water on the kitchen floor
sentences.chinese: 厨房地面上的一摊水

sentences.english: a warehouse that has 410,000 square feet of floor space
sentences.chinese: 楼面面积为41万平方英尺的仓库

detailed_translations.chinese: 地板，地面；楼层；基底；议员席
detailed_translations.english: the flat surface that you stand on inside a building

detailed_translations.chinese: 铺地板；打倒，击倒；（被困难）难倒
detailed_translations.english: to hit someone so hard that they fall down

sentences.english: a child’s favourite toy
sentences.chinese: 孩子最喜欢的玩具

sentences.english: What’s your favourite colour?
sentences.chinese: 你最喜欢什么颜色？

sentences.english: a favorite spot for picnickers
sentences.chinese: 野餐者最喜欢的地方

detailed_translations.english: your favourite person or thing is the one that you like the most
something that you like more than other things of the same kind

sentences.english: a lovely rose bush with delicate pink flowers
sentences.chinese: 一簇开着娇嫩的粉红色花朵的美丽蔷薇

sentences.english: fields full of beautiful wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 开满美丽野花的田野

sentences.english: It was May, and the apple trees were all in flower.
sentences.chinese: 那是个5月，苹果树开满了花。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured or white part that a plant or tree produces before fruit or seeds

sentences.english: a fear of flying
sentences.chinese: 害怕坐飞机

sentences.english: Fearing violence, the group asked for police protection.
sentences.chinese: 该团体担心发生暴力事件，所以请求警方保护。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling you get when you are afraid or worried that something bad is going to happen

sentences.english: Steven’s still in bed with flu .
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文患了流感，仍卧病在床。

sentences.english: She’s got the flu .
sentences.chinese: 她得了流感。

sentences.english: I couldn’t go because I had flu .
sentences.chinese: 我得了流感，去不了。

sentences.english: Doctors now fear a flu epidemic .
sentences.chinese: 医生现在担心会出现流感大爆发。

detailed_translations.english: a common illness that makes you feel very tired and weak, gives you a sore throat, and makes you cough and have to clear your nose a lot

sentences.english: Have you fed the cat?
sentences.chinese: 你喂猫了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to give food to a person or animal

sentences.chinese: 埃伦从房间那头飞奔过来，给了她叔叔一个吻。

sentences.english: By the time the police arrived, the men had flown.
sentences.chinese: 警察赶到时，那些人已经逃走了。

sentences.chinese: 我感到很沮丧。

sentences.english: Suddenly I felt a sharp pain in my shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 我突然感到肩部一阵剧痛。

sentences.english: I felt as if all my strength had gone.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得好象自己的力气已经全没了。

sentences.english: I felt like I was being kicked in the teeth every day.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉我好像每天都在经受挫折。

sentences.chinese: 她试图集中精神干活。

sentences.english: He focused his blue eyes on her.
sentences.chinese: 他那蓝色的眼睛注视着她。

sentences.english: Eggs became the focus for the food poisoning scare.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋成了食物中毒恐慌的焦点。

detailed_translations.english: to give attention, effort, etc. to one particular subject, situation or person rather than another
the thing, person, situation etc that people pay special attention to

sentences.english: Knowing we’d won was a wonderful feeling.
sentences.chinese: 得知我们赢了，感觉真好。

sentences.english: He’s considerate of other people’s feelings.
sentences.chinese: 他很顾及他人的感情。

detailed_translations.english: an emotion that you feel, such as anger, sadness, or happiness

sentences.english: It will be a cold night, and there may be fog patches .
sentences.chinese: 今夜天气寒冷，部分地区可能有雾。

sentences.english: A blanket of fog covered the fields.
sentences.chinese: 大雾笼罩了田野。

sentences.english: The fog lifted (= disappeared ) in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 下午，雾散了。

detailed_translations.english: cloudy air near the ground which is difficult to see through

detailed_translations.chinese: 使模糊；使困惑；以雾笼罩
detailed_translations.english: if something made of glass fogs or becomes fogged, it becomes covered in small drops of water that make it difficult to see through

sentences.english: the Swansea Festival of Music and the Arts
sentences.chinese: 斯旺西音乐艺术节

sentences.english: Christmas is one of the main festivals in the Christian Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节是基督教历的重大节日之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔电影、戏剧、音乐等的〕节，节庆，会演；节日
detailed_translations.english: an occasion when there are performances of many films, plays, pieces of music etc, usually happening in the same place every year

sentences.english: I’m sure there are some folk who would rather they weren’t here.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定有些人宁愿自己不在这里。

sentences.english: Thanks to the folks at NBC.
sentences.chinese: 感谢全国广播公司的工作人员。

sentences.english: Is it OK if I call my folks?
sentences.chinese: 我打电话给家里人可以吗？

detailed_translations.english: people

sentences.english: Andy has a fever and won’t be coming into work today.
sentences.chinese: 安迪发烧了，今天不来上班。

sentences.english: I woke up this morning with a fever and an upset stomach.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上醒来时我发烧了，胃也不舒服。

sentences.english: She’s running a fever (= has a fever ) .
sentences.chinese: 她在发烧。

detailed_translations.english: an illness or a medical condition in which you have a very high temperature

detailed_translations.chinese: 使发烧；使狂热；使患热病

sentences.english: Are those men following us?
sentences.chinese: 那些人在跟着我们吗？

sentences.english: The patrol car followed the BMW for a few miles and then lost it.
sentences.chinese: 巡逻车跟了那辆宝马几英里，后来就跟丢了。

sentences.english: The conclusion that follows from these findings is that inner city schools need more investment, not less.
sentences.chinese: 根据这些调研得出的结论是，旧城区学校的资金投入需要增加，而不是减少。

detailed_translations.english: to go, walk, drive etc behind or after someone else

sentences.english: ...spending her few waking hours in front of the TV.
sentences.chinese: …把她清醒的个把钟头花在电视机前。

detailed_translations.english: not many or hardly any people or things

sentences.english: The restaurant serves good food at affordable prices.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅物美价廉。

sentences.english: I love Italian food, especially pasta.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢意大利食物，尤其是面食。

sentences.english: He was told to cut down on salty and fatty foods.
sentences.chinese: 他被告知要少吃过咸和油腻的食物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 食物，食品；养料，精神食粮
detailed_translations.english: things that people and animals eat, such as vege-tables or meat

sentences.english: a view of green fields and rolling hills
sentences.chinese: 田野青翠、丘陵起伏的景色

sentences.english: Fans cheered as the players took the field (= went onto the field ) .
sentences.chinese: 球员上场时球迷们欢呼起来。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land in the country, especially one where crops are grown or animals feed on grass

sentences.english: What a fool she had been to think that he would stay.
sentences.chinese: 她竟然那么傻，以为他会留下来。

sentences.english: Like a fool, I accepted straight away.
sentences.chinese: 我像个傻子，立刻就接受了。

sentences.english: You silly old fool !
sentences.chinese: 你这个大傻瓜！

sentences.english: Even art experts were fooled.
sentences.chinese: 连艺术品专家也被骗了。

detailed_translations.english: a stupid person or someone who has done something stupid
to trick someone into believing something that is not true

sentences.english: Neither country is capable of fighting a long war .
sentences.chinese: 两个国家都没有能力打持久战。

sentences.english: Later the Indians fought the Anglo settlers.
sentences.chinese: 后来，印第安人跟英国殖民者打起了仗。

sentences.english: She fought her way back into the first team.
sentences.chinese: 她奋力拼搏，又回到了第一团队。

sentences.english: The men were fighting for higher wages.
sentences.chinese: 那些人在争取加薪。

detailed_translations.english: to take part in a war or battle

sentences.english: My foot hurts.
sentences.chinese: 我脚痛。

sentences.english: I had blisters on the soles of my feet .
sentences.chinese: 我的脚底起泡了。

sentences.english: I dropped a glass earlier, so don’t walk around in bare feet .
sentences.chinese: 我刚才打破了一个玻璃杯，所以不要光着脚到处走。

sentences.chinese: 兽医检查了马的后蹄。

sentences.english: He walked to the foot of the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 他走到楼梯下面。

sentences.english: He’s six feet tall , with blonde hair.
sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，一头金发。

sentences.chinese: 杰克用枪对着门口。

sentences.english: Two policemen were killed in a gun battle .
sentences.chinese: 两名警察在一次枪战中丧生。

detailed_translations.english: a metal weapon which shoots bullets or  shells

detailed_translations.chinese: 用枪射击；加大油门快速前进

sentences.english: Sam’s about the same height as his sister now.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆现在身高和他姐姐差不多了。

sentences.english: State your age, height, and weight.
sentences.chinese: 说出你的年龄、身高和体重。

sentences.english: Rachel had always been scared of heights.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔过去一直恐高。

detailed_translations.english: how tall someone or something is

sentences.english: Hello, John! How are you?
sentences.chinese: 喂，约翰！你好吗？

sentences.english: Stanley, come and say hello to your nephew.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦利，过来和你的侄子打声招呼。

sentences.english: Well, hello there ! I haven’t seen you for ages.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，你好！好久不见了。

detailed_translations.english: used as a greeting when you see or meet someone

detailed_translations.chinese: 表示问候， 惊奇或唤起注意时的用语

sentences.english: I have found a new gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 我找到一个新的健身房。

sentences.english: The next day, the arsonist was arrested at a gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，纵火犯在一家体育馆被逮捕了。

sentences.english: After computer printers and duffle bags had been carried to dorm rooms, everyone gathered in the gymnasium, students on one side of the bleachers, parents on the other.
sentences.chinese: 电脑打印机和行李包都运进了宿舍之后，所有人都到学校的体育馆集合，学生在露天看台的一侧，家长们在另一侧。

detailed_translations.english: a  gym

sentences.english: If there’s anything I can do to help, just give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要我帮忙，就给我打个电话。

sentences.english: Thank you for all your help.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你的一切帮助。

detailed_translations.english: to make it possible or easier for someone to do something by doing part of their work or by giving them something they need
things you do to make it easier or possible for someone to do something

sentences.english: Regular exercise is a good habit.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼是个好习惯。

sentences.english: Thinking negatively can become a habit.
sentences.chinese: 消极的思维方式会成为一种习惯。

sentences.english: She has a habit of playing with her hair when she’s nervous.
sentences.chinese: 她有一个习惯，一紧张就拨弄自己的头发。

sentences.english: Some people drink alcohol as much from habit as from desire.
sentences.chinese: 有些人喝酒既是因为想喝，也是出于习惯。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do regularly or usually, often without thinking about it because you have done it so many times before

sentences.english: Thank you for your advice; it’s been very helpful.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的建议，它非常有用。

sentences.english: It is helpful if we address a few key questions here.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们在这里解决一些关键问题会很有用的。

detailed_translations.english: providing useful help in making a situation better or easier

sentences.english: Her hair was short and dark.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发又短又黑。

sentences.english: a short fat man with no hair on his head
sentences.chinese: 光头的矮胖男人

sentences.english: The cat has left white hairs all over the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 白色的猫毛掉得满沙发都是。

detailed_translations.english: the mass of things like fine threads that grows on your head

sentences.english: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡聚集在母鸡翅膀下面。

sentences.english: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡集聚在母鸡翅膀下面。

sentences.english: The hen sits in the hencoop [henroost].
sentences.chinese: 母鸡卧窝。

detailed_translations.english: an adult female chicken

name: half
trans: n. 一半 adj. 一半的

sentences.english: Two halves make a whole.
sentences.chinese: 两个一半构成一个整体。

sentences.english: Only half the guests had arrived by seven o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 7点钟前只来了一半客人。

sentences.english: If you look at our members, at least half are women.
sentences.chinese: 看看我们的会员，至少有一半是女性。

sentences.english: ...a half measure of fresh lemon juice.
sentences.chinese: …半量杯的新鲜柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: one of two equal parts of something
exactly or about 50% (1/2) of an amount, time, distance, number etc

sentences.english: Jane? I don’t really know her.
sentences.chinese: 简？我不太认识她。

sentences.english: Margaret wants me to go with her.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特想让我和她一起去。

sentences.english: Give her the keys.
sentences.chinese: 把钥匙给她。

sentences.english: Her room was pleasant and airy.
sentences.chinese: 她的房间既舒适又通风。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
belonging to or connected with a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned

sentences.english: a huge tiled entrance hall
sentences.chinese: 铺着地砖的大门厅

sentences.english: Each floor had ten rooms on both sides of the hall.
sentences.chinese: 每一层在走廊的两边都各有十个房间。

detailed_translations.english: the area just inside the door of a house or other building, that leads to other rooms

sentences.english: What are you doing here?
sentences.chinese: 你们在这里干什么？

sentences.english: Shall we eat here?
sentences.chinese: 我们在这里吃好吗？

sentences.english: Come here for a minute.
sentences.chinese: 到这里来一下。

sentences.english: This switch here controls the lights.
sentences.chinese: 此处的这个开关控制电灯。

sentences.english: My friend here will show you the way.
sentences.chinese: 我这位朋友会给你指路的。

sentences.english: Come on. I’m over here .
sentences.chinese: 快点，我在这里。

sentences.english: Will you be back here tonight?
sentences.chinese: 今晚你回这里吗？

sentences.english: There are no good pubs round here .
sentences.chinese: 这一带没有好的酒吧。

sentences.english: Let’s settle the matter here and now .
sentences.chinese: 我们现在就解决此事吧。

detailed_translations.english: used after a verb or preposition to mean ‘in, at or to this position or place ’

sentences.english: A hamburger and a coke.
sentences.chinese: 一个汉堡和一杯可乐。

sentences.english: Then have a hamburger.
sentences.chinese: 那么吃一个汉堡吧。

sentences.english: I order a soda and a hamburger for myself. Then another person gets coffee for me.
sentences.chinese: 嗯， 我为自己点了一杯苏打和一个汉堡包， 然后另外一人给我拿了杯咖啡。

detailed_translations.english: a flat round piece of finely cut beef(= meat from a cow ) which is cooked and eaten in a bread bun

sentences.english: He had dared to speak out against injustice, and overnight he became a national hero .
sentences.chinese: 他敢于站出来抨击不公正的现象，一夜之间就成了国家英雄。

sentences.english: His father was a war hero , a former fighter pilot.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲是一位战争英雄，曾经是战斗机飞行员。

sentences.english: the unsung heroes who drove convoys of aid to Bosnia
sentences.chinese: 运载援助物品到波斯尼亚的那些无名英雄

sentences.english: A man hailed as a hero for 50 years has been unmasked as a traitor.
sentences.chinese: 50年来一直被誉为英雄的人被揭发为叛徒。

sentences.english: The hero of Doctor Zhivago dies in 1929.
sentences.chinese: 《日瓦戈医生》的男主人公于1929年去世。

detailed_translations.english: a man who is admired for doing something extremely brave

sentences.english: Steve gripped the steering wheel tightly with both hands.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫双手紧握方向盘。

sentences.english: In her hand was a tattered old photograph.
sentences.chinese: 她手中拿着的是一张破旧的老照片。

sentences.english: the hour hand
sentences.chinese: 时针

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body at the end of your arm, including your fingers and thumb, that you use to hold things

sentences.english: He bent and touched his mouth to hers.
sentences.chinese: 他俯身吻她的嘴唇。

sentences.english: These are my gloves. Hers are in the drawer.
sentences.chinese: 这是我的手套，她的在抽屉里。

sentences.english: The idea was hers.
sentences.chinese: 这个主意是她出的。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned

sentences.english: Rice: No, I only have a handbag.
sentences.chinese: 没有，我只有一个手提包。

sentences.english: He grabbed at her handbag .
sentences.chinese: 他抢夺了她的手提包。

sentences.english: Is this my (your) handbag?
sentences.chinese: 这是我的手提包吗？

detailed_translations.english: a small bag in which a woman carries money and personal things

sentences.english: She hurt herself.
sentences.chinese: 她弄伤了自己。

sentences.english: She must be very proud of herself.
sentences.chinese: 她一定非常自豪。

detailed_translations.english: used when the woman or girl who performs an action is also affected by it

sentences.english: an extremely handsome young man
sentences.chinese: 一位特别英俊的年轻人

sentences.english: They won a handsome victory in the elections.
sentences.chinese: 他们在选举中取得了重大的胜利。

detailed_translations.english: a man who is handsome looks attractive

sentences.english: Hi! How are you?
sentences.chinese: 嗨！你好吗？

sentences.english: Hi there! I haven’t seen you for ages.
sentences.chinese: 嘿！好久不见。

detailed_translations.chinese: 嗨！（表示问候或用以唤起注意）
detailed_translations.english: hello

sentences.english: Philip hung his coat on a hook behind the door.
sentences.chinese: 菲利普把自己的大衣挂在门后的钩子上。

sentences.english: She hung the sheets on the washing line.
sentences.chinese: 她把床单晾在晒衣绳上。

detailed_translations.chinese: [hung-hung] 悬挂， 吊； 徘徊； [hanged-hanged] 吊
detailed_translations.english: to put something in a position so that the top part is fixed or supported, and the bottom part is free to move and does not touch the ground

sentences.english: She keeps a bottle of gin hidden behind a stack of books.
sentences.chinese: 她在一堆书的后面藏了一瓶杜松子酒。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately put or keep something or someone in a place where they cannot easily be seen or found

sentences.english: When did the accident happen?
sentences.chinese: 事故什么时候发生的？

sentences.english: It’s impossible to predict what will happen next.
sentences.chinese: 不可能预测接下来会发生什么。

sentences.english: She carried on as if nothing had happened.
sentences.chinese: 她继续干，似乎什么都未曾发生。

sentences.english: This was bound to happen sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 这事注定早晚会发生。

sentences.english: This kind of thing happens all the time.
sentences.chinese: 这种事一直在发生。

sentences.english: As it happens, I know someone who might be able to help.
sentences.chinese: 真巧，我正好认识一个人，这个人也许帮得上忙。

sentences.english: We happened to discover we had a friend in common.
sentences.chinese: 我们碰巧发现我们有个共同的朋友。

detailed_translations.english: when something happens, there is an event, especially one that is not planned

sentences.english: This is the highest mountain in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 这是日本最高的山。

sentences.english: The camp was surrounded by a high fence.
sentences.chinese: 营地四周围着高高的栅栏。

sentences.english: a ten-foot high statue
sentences.chinese: 10英尺高的雕像

sentences.english: How high is the Eiffel Tower?
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔有多高？

sentences.english: He kicked the ball high into the air, over the heads of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他把球高高地踢向空中，越过了人群。

detailed_translations.english: measuring a long distance from the bottom to the top
at or to a level high above the ground, the floor etc

sentences.english: He wants to hike round the world.
sentences.chinese: 他打算徒步旅行环游世界一周。

sentences.english: You can organize a picnic in the park, a group hike or bike ride, or meet up with friends for one of those free local events.
sentences.chinese: 你可以组织在公园野餐一群徒步旅行或者骑自行车或者和朋友会面为其中的一个免费本地事件。

detailed_translations.english: to take a long walk in the mountains or countryside
a long walk in the mountains or countryside
to increase a price, tax etc by a large amount

sentences.english: a huge dog
sentences.chinese: 一条大狗

sentences.english: huge crowds
sentences.chinese: 大群大群的人

sentences.english: Your room’s huge compared to mine.
sentences.chinese: 你的房间跟我的比很大。

sentences.english: These shoes make my feet look huge.
sentences.chinese: 这双鞋让我的脚看上去大极了。

sentences.english: the huge scale of the problem
sentences.chinese: 该问题的严重性

detailed_translations.english: extremely large in size, amount, or degree

sentences.english: Their house is on a hill overlooking the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子建在可以俯视大海的小山上。

sentences.english: A cart was making its way up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车正在爬上山丘。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is higher than the land around it, like a mountain but smaller

sentences.english: There are many different cell types in the human body .
sentences.chinese: 人体中有许多种不同的细胞类型。

sentences.english: the power of the human mind
sentences.chinese: 人脑的威力

sentences.english: The desire for joy lies deep within the human spirit .
sentences.chinese: 对快乐的渴求藏在人类心灵深处。

sentences.english: Infra-red light is invisible to the human eye.
sentences.chinese: 红外线是人眼看不见的。

sentences.english: theories of human behaviour
sentences.chinese: 关于人类行为的理论

sentences.english: different areas of human experience
sentences.chinese: 人类各方面的经验

sentences.english: respect for the absolute value of human life
sentences.chinese: 对人类生命绝对价值的尊重

sentences.english: The accident was the result of human error.
sentences.chinese: 事故是由于人为过失造成的。

sentences.english: The meat was declared unfit for human consumption.
sentences.chinese: 这种肉被宣布不适合人类食用。

sentences.english: Like humans, cats and dogs are omnivores.
sentences.chinese: 和人类一样，猫和狗是杂食性动物。

detailed_translations.english: belonging to or relating to people, especially as opposed to machines or animals
a person

sentences.english: Are you in love with him?
sentences.chinese: 你爱上他了吗？

sentences.english: Why don’t you ask him yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不自己问他？

sentences.english: He repeated what she had told him.
sentences.chinese: 他把她告诉他的话重复了一遍。

sentences.english: I knew it was him as soon as I heard his voice.
sentences.chinese: 我一听声音就知道是他。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: humorous stories
sentences.chinese: 诙谐的故事

sentences.english: The film has some mildly humorous moments.
sentences.chinese: 那部电影中有些略显幽默的片段。

detailed_translations.english: funny and enjoyable

sentences.english: He repossessed himself of his farm.
sentences.chinese: 他收回自己所有的农场。

sentences.english: He barred himself in.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己关在里面。

sentences.english: He stroked the name of himself with his pen.
sentences.chinese: 他用钢笔划掉了他自己的名字。

sentences.english: his humour and charm
sentences.chinese: 他的幽默感和魅力

sentences.english: Greg’s feeble attempt at humour
sentences.chinese: 格雷格干巴巴的幽默

sentences.english: English humour
sentences.chinese: 英国式幽默

sentences.english: It’s vital to have a sense of humor in this job.
sentences.chinese: 做这份工作必须具备幽默感。

sentences.english: The host puts the contestants at ease with his own brand of humour .
sentences.chinese: 主持人以他别具一格的幽默让参赛者放松心情。

sentences.english: He showed flashes of humor that delighted the audience.
sentences.chinese: 他不时冒出些幽默话逗得观众忍俊不禁。

detailed_translations.english: the ability or tendency to think that things are funny, or funny things you say that show you have this ability
to do what someone wants or to pretend to agree with them so that they do not become upset

sentences.english: He took my hand in his.
sentences.chinese: 他握住我的手。

detailed_translations.english: of or belonging to him

sentences.english: I was cold, tired, and hungry.
sentences.chinese: 我又冷，又累，又饿。

sentences.english: If you get hungry, there’s some cold chicken in the fridge.
sentences.chinese: 你要是饿了，冰箱里有些冷鸡肉。

sentences.english: Do you still feel hungry?
sentences.chinese: 你还觉得饿吗？

sentences.english: She is hungry for success.
sentences.chinese: 她渴望成功。

detailed_translations.english: wanting to eat something

sentences.english: Throughout history the achievements of women have been largely ignored.
sentences.chinese: 从古至今，妇女的成就都被大大地忽视了。

sentences.english: No man in recent history has done more to rebuild the Democratic Party.
sentences.chinese: 他对重建民主党的贡献在近代史上无人能及。

sentences.english: the early history of Scotland
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰的早期历史

sentences.english: Other meteor storms have occurred in recorded history .
sentences.chinese: 在有记载的历史上发生过其他的流星暴。

sentences.english: a museum devoted to local history
sentences.chinese: 专门介绍当地历史的博物馆

sentences.english: one of the darkest episodes in American history
sentences.chinese: 美国历史上最黑暗的事件之一

sentences.english: an interesting period in Egyptian history
sentences.chinese: 埃及历史上一段有趣的时期

sentences.english: a decision that changed the course of history
sentences.chinese: 改变历史进程的决定

sentences.english: a college steeped in history
sentences.chinese: 一所历史悠久的学院

sentences.english: Your doctor will ask for your medical history.
sentences.chinese: 医生会询问你的病历。

detailed_translations.english: all the things that happened in the past, especially the political, social, or economic development of a nation

sentences.english: lion/rhino/stag etc hunt
sentences.chinese: 猎狮/犀牛/雄鹿等

sentences.english: the hunt for the missing child
sentences.chinese: 搜寻失踪儿童

sentences.english: Wolves tend to hunt in packs (= hunt in groups ) .
sentences.chinese: 狼往往成群捕猎。

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when people chase animals in order to kill or catch them
to chase animals and birds in order to kill or catch them

sentences.english: Which band had a hit with ‘Bohemian Rhapsody’?
sentences.chinese: 《波希米亚狂想曲》是哪支乐队风行一时的歌曲？

detailed_translations.english: something such as a film, play, song etc that is very popular and successful

sentences.english: If we hurry, we’ll get there in time.
sentences.chinese: 要是赶紧的话，我们能及时到那里。

sentences.english: I hate having to hurry a meal.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌匆匆忙忙地吃饭。

sentences.english: We’ll have to hurry, otherwise we’ll miss the start.
sentences.chinese: 我们得赶紧，否则就会错过开头部分了。

sentences.english: There’s no need to hurry. We’ve got plenty of time.
sentences.chinese: 不必匆忙，我们有的是时间。

detailed_translations.english: to do something or go somewhere more quickly than usual, especially because there is not much time
to make someone do something more quickly

sentences.english: What are your hobbies?
sentences.chinese: 你有些什么爱好？

sentences.english: Susan’s hobbies include reading, cooking, and drama.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊的业余爱好包括阅读、烹饪和戏剧。

sentences.english: Retirement gave him the time to pursue his hobbies.
sentences.chinese: 退休以后他有充裕的时间来做自己喜欢做的事。

detailed_translations.english: an activity that you enjoy doing in your free time

sentences.english: Was anyone hurt in the accident?
sentences.chinese: 事故中有人受伤吗？

sentences.english: Put that thing down - you might hurt someone with it.
sentences.chinese: 快把那东西放下，你会伤着别人的。

sentences.english: I didn’t mean to hurt your feelings.
sentences.chinese: 我不是故意要伤害你的感情。

detailed_translations.english: to injure yourself or someone else

sentences.english: She was holding a large box.
sentences.chinese: 她提着一只大箱子。

sentences.english: I held the mouse by its tail.
sentences.chinese: 我抓着耗子的尾巴倒提起来。

sentences.english: Employees hold 30% of the shares.
sentences.chinese: 雇员持有30%的股份。

detailed_translations.english: to carry sth; to have sb/sth in your hand, arms, etc.

sentences.english: Have you met my husband Roy?
sentences.chinese: 你见过我的丈夫罗伊吗？

detailed_translations.english: the man that a woman is married to

sentences.english: I began digging a hole for the plant.
sentences.chinese: 我开始挖洞种那棵植物。

detailed_translations.english: an empty space in something solid
to hit the ball into a hole in golf

sentences.english: I moved to this city six years ago.
sentences.chinese: 六年前我搬到了这个城市。

sentences.english: I’m not late again, am I?
sentences.chinese: 我没有又迟到吧？

sentences.english: My husband and I enjoy going to the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫喜欢去剧院看戏。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself

sentences.english: The school holidays start tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 学校假期从明天开始。

sentences.english: a national holiday
sentences.chinese: 全国假日

detailed_translations.english: a time of rest from work, school etc

sentences.english: They have a beautiful home in California.
sentences.chinese: 他们在加州有个美丽的家。

sentences.english: Good luck in your new home!
sentences.chinese: 祝你在新家一切顺利！

sentences.english: A family of birds made their home (= started living ) under the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝鸟在屋顶下安了家。

sentences.english: These children need a proper home life.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要正常的家庭生活。

detailed_translations.english: the house, apartment, or place where you live
relating to or belonging to your home or family

sentences.english: Do you like your hometown?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢你的家乡吗？

sentences.english: She expressed the wish to be interred in the graveyard of hometown.
sentences.chinese: 她表达了死后葬在故乡的墓地上的愿望。

detailed_translations.english: Someone's hometown is the town where they live or the town that they come from

sentences.english: You should talk to Ken – he's always full of good ideas.
sentences.chinese: 你应该和肯谈谈，他总是满脑子好主意。

sentences.english: I knew it was a bad idea to leave him on his own.
sentences.chinese: 我知道把他独自留下不是个好主意。

sentences.english: It was my wife’s idea to move house.
sentences.chinese: 要搬家是我妻子的主意。

sentences.english: He has some very strange ideas about education.
sentences.chinese: 他对教育有些非常奇怪的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or suggestion for a possible course of action, especially one that you think of suddenly

sentences.english: For homework, finish the exercise on page 14.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业是完成第14页的练习。

detailed_translations.english: work that a student at school is asked to do at home

sentences.english: We’ll stay at home if it rains.
sentences.chinese: 如果下雨，我们就待在家里。

sentences.english: If you need money, I can lend you some.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要钱，我能借给你一些。

sentences.english: If I didn’t apologize, I’d feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不道歉，我会感到内疚。

sentences.english: If you had worked harder, you would have passed your exams.
sentences.chinese: 要是你再努力一点，就通过考试了。

sentences.english: What would happen to your family if you were to die in an accident?
sentences.chinese: 要是你在意外事故中身亡，你的家人会怎么样呢？

sentences.english: If Dad were here, he would know what to do.
sentences.chinese: 如果爸爸在这儿，他会知道怎么做的。

sentences.english: Taste the soup and add salt and pepper if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 尝一下汤，需要的话加一点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: I want to get back by five o’clock if possible.
sentences.chinese: 如果可能的话，我想5点之前回来。

sentences.english: I think I can fix it tomorrow. If not, you’ll have to wait till Friday.
sentences.chinese: 我想明天我能修好它，如果不行，你只好等到周五了。

sentences.english: Is the book available, and if so, where?
sentences.chinese: 有没有这本书？ 如果有的话，在哪儿？

sentences.english: The missiles can be fired only if the operator types in a six-digit code.
sentences.chinese: 只有在操作员输入一组六位数密码后，导弹才能发射。

sentences.english: We’ll face that problem if and when it comes along (= if it happens or when it happens ).
sentences.chinese: 如果这一问题真的发生了，我们就要面对它。

sentences.english: If by any chance you can’t manage dinner tonight, perhaps we can at least have a drink together.
sentences.chinese: 万一你今晚不能来吃饭，或许我们至少可以一起喝一杯。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking about something that might happen or be true, or might have happened

sentences.english: He was a hard-working, honest man.
sentences.chinese: 他勤奋老实。

sentences.english: Ann had an honest face.
sentences.chinese: 安有一张诚实的面孔。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is honest always tells the truth and does not cheat or steal

sentences.english: Bridget can’t come – she’s ill.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特不能来了，她生病了。

sentences.english: He was unable to join the army because of ill health.
sentences.chinese: 他因为身体不好没法参军。

sentences.english: The animals had been grossly ill-treated.
sentences.chinese: 那些动物受到了恣意虐待。

detailed_translations.english: suffering from a disease or not feeling well
badly or in an unpleasant way

sentences.english: Hi, honey.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，亲爱的。

detailed_translations.english: a sweet sticky substance produced by  bees  , used as food

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…说甜言蜜语；加蜜使甜

sentences.english: She had all the normal childhood illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 儿童的常见病她小时候都得过。

sentences.english: Her mother was recovering from a serious illness.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲重病后正在逐渐康复。

sentences.english: I’ve never missed a day’s work through illness.
sentences.chinese: 我从未因病耽误过一天工作。

sentences.english: ways to improve your health and reduce the risk of illness
sentences.chinese: 增进健康减少疾病的方法

detailed_translations.english: a disease of the body or mind, or the condition of being ill

name: honour
trans: n. 荣誉 v. 尊重

sentences.english: He was showered with honours – among them an Oscar.
sentences.chinese: 他获得了很多荣誉–其中包括奥斯卡奖。

detailed_translations.english: the respect that you, your family, your country etc receive from other people, which makes you feel proud

detailed_translations.chinese: 尊敬；[金融] 承兑；承兑远期票据
detailed_translations.english: to treat someone with special respect

sentences.english: Imagine that you have just won a million pounds.
sentences.chinese: 设想你刚刚赢得一百万英镑。

sentences.english: He didn’t quite dare to imagine himself as a real artist.
sentences.chinese: 他不太敢把自己想象成一个真正的艺术家。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture or idea in your mind about what something could be like

sentences.english: I do hope everything goes well.
sentences.chinese: 我真心希望一切顺利。

sentences.english: It was hoped that the job would be filled by a local person.
sentences.chinese: 希望该职位由当地人来担任。

sentences.english: Let’s just hope someone finds her bag.
sentences.chinese: 希望有人找到她的提包。

sentences.english: I hope to God I haven’t left the car window open.
sentences.chinese: 但愿我没有忘记关车窗。

sentences.english: When I first arrived in New York, I was full of hope for the future.
sentences.chinese: 我初到纽约时，对未来充满希望。

detailed_translations.english: to want something to happen or be true and to believe that it is possible or likely
a feeling of wanting something to happen or be true and believing that it is possible or likely

sentences.english: Our immediate response to the attack was sheer horror.
sentences.chinese: 我们对攻击的第一反应就是非常惊恐。

sentences.english: They promise immediate action to help the unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 他们承诺立即采取行动帮助失业者。

sentences.english: If the eyes are affected, seek immediate medical attention.
sentences.chinese: 如果眼睛感染了要立即就医。

sentences.english: The funeral was attended by her immediate family (= her parents, children, brothers and sisters) only.
sentences.chinese: 只有她的直系亲属参加了葬礼。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done at once and without delay

sentences.english: a horse and cart
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车

sentences.english: Lee had never ridden a horse before.
sentences.chinese: 李以前从未骑过马。

detailed_translations.english: a large strong animal that people ride and use for pulling heavy things

sentences.english: a very important meeting
sentences.chinese: 很重要的会议

sentences.english: The accident taught him an important lesson.
sentences.chinese: 那次事故给了他很大的教训。

sentences.english: Happiness is more important than money.
sentences.chinese: 快乐比金钱更重要。

sentences.english: ‘What did you say?’ ‘Oh, nothing important.’
sentences.chinese: “你说什么？”“噢，没什么大事。”

sentences.english: It’s vitally important that you understand the danger.
sentences.chinese: 了解危险所在是极为重要的。

sentences.english: a very important customer
sentences.chinese: 一位大客户

detailed_translations.english: an important event, decision, problem etc has a big effect or influence on people’s lives or on events in the future

sentences.english: They are building a new hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在建一家新医院。

detailed_translations.english: a large building where sick or injured people receive medical treatment

sentences.english: ‘I want to speak to Mr Franks.’ ‘I’m afraid that’s impossible.’
sentences.chinese: “我想和弗兰克斯先生谈谈。”“恐怕不行。”

sentences.english: It’s impossible to be accurate about these things.
sentences.chinese: 这些事情不可能准确无误 。

sentences.english: The noise made sleep impossible.
sentences.chinese: 噪音吵得人无法睡觉。

sentences.english: Members with young children often found it impossible to attend evening meetings.
sentences.chinese: 有小孩的会员常觉得没法参加晚上的聚会。

sentences.english: It is difficult to find work these days, but for blind people it is virtually impossible.
sentences.chinese: 现在找工作很难，对于盲人来说几乎是不可能。

sentences.english: He was faced with a seemingly impossible task.
sentences.chinese: 他面临着似乎不可能完成的任务。

sentences.english: It was physically impossible to get the fridge through the door.
sentences.chinese: 根本不可能把冰箱从这扇门搬过去。

sentences.english: Six months ago, peace seemed an impossible dream.
sentences.chinese: 六个月前和平还似乎是个无法实现的梦。

sentences.english: Such mental attitudes are difficult, if not impossible, to change.
sentences.chinese: 即使有可能，要改变这样的心态也是很难的。

detailed_translations.english: something that is impossible cannot happen or be done

name: host
trans: n.主人, 主办方 v.主持

sentences.english: Which country is going to host the next World Cup?
sentences.chinese: 哪个国家将主办下一届世界杯？

detailed_translations.english: to provide the place and everything that is needed for an organized event

sentences.english: a course for students wishing to improve their English
sentences.chinese: 为想提高英语水平的学生开设的一门课

sentences.english: The doctors say she is improving (= after being ill ).
sentences.chinese: 医生说她正在康复。

sentences.english: You could use the money for improving your home.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用这笔钱改善家居。

sentences.english: Many wines improve with age (= get better as they get older ).
sentences.chinese: 很多葡萄酒年代越久越香醇。

detailed_translations.english: to make something better, or to become better
to make something better, or to become better

sentences.english: The hostess introduced them.
sentences.chinese: 女主人介绍了他们。

detailed_translations.chinese: 女主人，女老板；女服务员；舞女；女房东
detailed_translations.english: a woman at a party, meal etc who has invited all the guests and provides them with food, drink etc

sentences.english: There’s some sugar in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 碗橱里有一些糖。

sentences.english: My mother was in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲在厨房里。

sentences.english: He took us for a drive in his new car.
sentences.chinese: 他开着他的新车载我们去兜风。

sentences.english: I found her sitting up in bed.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她直直地坐在床上。

sentences.english: Manson spent fifteen years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 曼森在监狱里待了15年。

sentences.english: a hole in the ground
sentences.chinese: 地上的一个洞

sentences.english: Mr Fisher is in Boston this week.
sentences.chinese: 费希尔先生本周在波士顿。

sentences.english: My parents live in New Zealand now.
sentences.chinese: 我父母现住在新西兰。

sentences.english: I never went in pubs.
sentences.chinese: 我从不进酒吧。

detailed_translations.english: used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is

sentences.english: a hot day in July
sentences.chinese: 7月炎热的一天

sentences.english: a hot curry
sentences.chinese: 一种辛辣的咖喱

detailed_translations.english: something that is hot has a high temperature - used about weather, places, food, drink, or objects

sentences.english: Does the price include postage?
sentences.chinese: 这个价格包含邮费吗？

sentences.english: His job includes looking after under-21 teams.
sentences.chinese: 他的职责包括照管21岁以下球队。

sentences.english: The curriculum includes courses in computing.
sentences.chinese: 课程内容包括计算机技术。

detailed_translations.english: if one thing includes another, the second thing is part of the first

sentences.english: I’ve booked the flights and the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我已订好机票和酒店。

sentences.english: We’ll be staying at the Hotel Ibis.
sentences.chinese: 我们将住在宜必思酒店。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people pay to stay and eat meals

sentences.english: The population increased dramatically in the first half of the century.
sentences.chinese: 该世纪上半叶，人口大幅度增加。

sentences.english: political tensions that might increase the likelihood of war
sentences.chinese: 或许会增加战争爆发可能性的紧张政治局面

sentences.english: Visits to the site have increased threefold since May.
sentences.chinese: 来这里的参观者自5月起已增至原来的三倍。

sentences.english: an increase in spending
sentences.chinese: 开支的增长

detailed_translations.english: to become or to make sth greater in amount, number, value, etc.
a rise in the amount, number or value of sth

sentences.english: The interview will last about two hours.
sentences.chinese: 面试大概要持续两小时。

sentences.english: I study for an hour every night.
sentences.chinese: 我每晚学习一小时。

sentences.english: I’ll be back in three hours .
sentences.chinese: 我三小时以后回来。

sentences.english: Three hours later he was back.
sentences.chinese: 三小时后他回来了。

sentences.english: Her bag was stolen within hours of her arrival.
sentences.chinese: 她才到没几个小时，手提包就被偷了。

sentences.english: You weren’t interested in my story a half hour ago.
sentences.chinese: 半小时之前你还对我讲的事情不感兴趣呢。

sentences.english: It takes about a quarter of an hour to walk into town.
sentences.chinese: 步行进城大约需要一刻钟。

sentences.english: The hotel is only an hour’s drive from the airport.
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆离机场只有一小时的车程。

sentences.english: a top speed of 120 miles an hour
sentences.chinese: 120英里的最高时速

sentences.english: Please call during office hours.
sentences.chinese: 请在办公时间来电。

sentences.english: There was a knock on the door in the early hours of the morning.
sentences.chinese: 凌晨时分有人敲门。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring time. There are 60 minutes in one hour, and 24 hours in one day.

sentences.english: Burma borders on India.
sentences.chinese: 缅甸与印度毗邻。

sentences.english: This book treats of the caste system in India.
sentences.chinese: 这本书论述了印度的种姓制度。

sentences.english: If you come to India for just one thing, this should be it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你只为一件事来到印度，那就到这儿来吧。

sentences.english: a four-bedroom house
sentences.chinese: 一幢有四间卧室的房子

sentences.english: America’s oldest publishing house
sentences.chinese: 美国历史最悠久的出版社

sentences.english: a small independent software house
sentences.chinese: 一家小型的独立软件公司

sentences.english: an auction house
sentences.chinese: 一家拍卖行

sentences.english: a famous Italian fashion house
sentences.chinese: 一家著名的意大利时装公司

detailed_translations.english: a building that someone lives in, especially one that has more than one level and is intended to be used by one family

name: Indian
trans: n. 印度人adj. 印度的

sentences.english: the Indian government
sentences.chinese: 印度政府

detailed_translations.english: relating to India or its people
someone from India

sentences.english: Men are doing more housework nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 现今男人正在承担越来越多的家务。

detailed_translations.english: work that you do to take care of a house, for example washing, cleaning etc

sentences.english: I work in the oil industry.
sentences.chinese: 我在石油行业工作。

sentences.english: Italy’s thriving tourist industry
sentences.chinese: 意大利蓬勃发展的旅游业

sentences.english: Gould is a man of great industry.
sentences.chinese: 古尔德是一个很勤劳的人。

detailed_translations.english: businesses that produce a particular type of thing or provide a particular service

sentences.english: How do you spell your name?
sentences.chinese: 你的名字怎么拼写？

sentences.english: How can I help you?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么帮你？

sentences.english: I’d like to help in some way, but I’m not sure how.
sentences.chinese: 我想帮点忙，可不知道该怎么做。

sentences.english: He explained how the system worked.
sentences.chinese: 他讲解了该系统是如何运转的。

sentences.english: We both used to work at the airport – that’s how we met.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都曾经在机场工作过，我们就是这么认识的。

sentences.english: advice on how best (= the best way ) to invest your money
sentences.chinese: 如何以最好方式进行投资的建议

sentences.english: They had a number of suggestions as to how the service could be improved.
sentences.chinese: 他们有一些关于如何改进服务的建议。

sentences.english: This still leaves the question of how local services should be funded.
sentences.chinese: 这仍然没有解决如何为地方公共服务业提供资金的问题。

sentences.english: How many kids do they have now?
sentences.chinese: 他们现在有几个孩子？

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the way in which something happens or is done

sentences.english: A lot can be inferred from these statistics.
sentences.chinese: 根据这些统计资料可以推断出很多事情。

sentences.english: From the evidence, we can infer that the victim knew her killer.
sentences.chinese: 根据证据我们可以推断出受害者认识凶手。

detailed_translations.english: to form an opinion that something is probably true because of information that you have

sentences.english: This is a cheap and simple process. However, there are dangers.
sentences.chinese: 这是个花钱少而又简单的方法，不过有危险。

sentences.english: an extremely unpleasant disease that is, however, easy to treat
sentences.chinese: 一种让人极其难受却容易治疗的病

sentences.english: However you look at it, it's going to cost a lot.
sentences.chinese: 不管你怎么看，它都要花很多钱。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are adding a fact or piece of information that seems surprising, or seems very different from what you have just said

sentences.english: He used his influence to get his son into medical school.
sentences.chinese: 他利用权势把儿子弄进了医学院。

sentences.english: He denies exerting any political influence over them.
sentences.chinese: 他否认曾向他们施加过政治影响。

detailed_translations.english: the power to make other people agree with your opinions or do what you want

sentences.english: We stood there crying and hugging each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们站在那里哭着互相拥抱。

sentences.english: She went to her daughter and hugged her tightly .
sentences.chinese: 她走到女儿身边，紧紧地拥抱她。

detailed_translations.english: to put your arms around someone and hold them tightly to show love or friendship
to put your arms around someone and hold them tightly to show love or friendship
the action of putting your arms around someone and holding them tightly to show love or friendship

sentences.english: I need more information.
sentences.chinese: 我需要更多信息。

detailed_translations.english: facts or details that tell you something about a situation, person, event etc

sentences.english: an insect bite
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的叮咬

sentences.english: flying insects
sentences.chinese: 飞虫

sentences.english: Don’t forget to bring insect repellant (= a chemical to keep insects away ).
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记带上驱虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: a small creature such as a fly or ant, that has six legs, and sometimes wings

sentences.english: I couldn’t go out with someone for a joke, could you?
sentences.chinese: 我可不能拿谈恋爱当儿戏，对不对？

sentences.english: I never joke about money.
sentences.chinese: 我从不拿钱开玩笑。

detailed_translations.english: something that you say or do to make people laugh, especially a funny story or trick
to say things that are intended to be funny and that you do not really mean

sentences.english: He concealed the key inside his tie.
sentences.chinese: 他把钥匙藏在领带里面。

sentences.english: The door had been locked from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 门从里面锁上了。

detailed_translations.english: in or into a container or other closed space so as to be completely covered or surrounded
the inner part of something, which is surrounded or hidden by the outer part

sentences.english: the friends they made on the journey
sentences.chinese: 他们在旅途中交下的朋友

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when you travel from one place to another, especially over a long distance
an occasion when you travel from one place to another, especially over a long distance

sentences.english: Stay for supper – I insist!
sentences.chinese: 留下来吃晚餐——一定的！

detailed_translations.english: to demand that something should happen

sentences.english: the look of joy on her face
sentences.chinese: 她脸上的喜悦表情

sentences.english: The garden was his pride and joy.
sentences.chinese: 这座花园是他的骄傲和乐趣所在。

detailed_translations.english: great happiness and pleasure

sentences.english: You probably picked up my keys instead of yours.
sentences.chinese: 你可能没拿你的钥匙而错拿了我的。

sentences.english: Could I have tuna instead of ham?
sentences.chinese: 我可否要金枪鱼来代替火腿？

sentences.english: Instead of being annoyed, he seemed quite pleased.
sentences.chinese: 他没有生气，反而似乎很高兴。

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is not used, does not happen etc, when something else is used, happens etc

sentences.english: You should never judge a person by their looks.
sentences.chinese: 决不要以貌取人。

sentences.english: Judge us on the improvements we make in the economy.
sentences.chinese: 请根据我们在经济方面取得的进步来评价我们。

sentences.english: The therapist judged that Margaret had made a serious attempt to kill herself.
sentences.chinese: 治疗专家断定玛格丽特曾真的企图自杀。

sentences.english: pollutants that were judged hazardous to human health
sentences.chinese: 被认为对人体健康有害的污染物

sentences.english: I am in no position to judge whether what she is doing is right or wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我无权评判她在做的事是对是错。

sentences.english: The economic results of the reforms are very difficult to judge.
sentences.chinese: 这些改革所带来的经济成效很难评价。

sentences.english: The likelihood of future bombs was impossible to judge.
sentences.chinese: 未来发生爆炸案的可能性无法预测。

sentences.english: We judge the success of a product by the number of sales it brings in.
sentences.chinese: 我们以销量来评价一种产品成功与否。

sentences.english: His conduct, judged objectively by what he has done, is dishonest.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为，从他所做的这一切客观地来评价，是不诚实的。

sentences.english: Robert wanted to go and help him, but judged it best to stay where he was.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特想过去帮他，但考虑之后还是觉得待在原地为妙。

sentences.english: Do not judge her too harshly, as she was very young at the time.
sentences.chinese: 对她的评价不要太苛刻，毕竟那时候她还很年轻。

detailed_translations.english: to form or give an opinion about someone or something after thinking carefully about all the information you know about them
the official in control of a court, who decides how criminals should be punished

sentences.english: (= I have been told ) to give the package to him personally.
sentences.chinese: 我接到的指示是亲手把包裹交给他。

sentences.english: Make sure you carry out the doctor’s instructions.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要遵照医生的嘱咐。

sentences.english: The school gives instruction in first aid.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校教授急救课

detailed_translations.english: a statement telling someone what they must do

sentences.english: a carton of orange juice
sentences.chinese: 一纸盒橙汁

sentences.english: A Coke and a tomato juice, please.
sentences.chinese: 请来一杯可乐和一杯番茄汁。

detailed_translations.english: the liquid that comes from fruit and vegetables, or a drink that is made from this

sentences.english: surgical instruments
sentences.chinese: 外科(手术)器械

detailed_translations.chinese: 仪器， 工具； 乐器
detailed_translations.english: a small tool used in work such as science or medicine

sentences.english: The cats jumped down and came to meet us.
sentences.chinese: 这些猫跳下来，过来迎接我们。

detailed_translations.english: to let yourself drop from a place that is above the ground
to let yourself drop from a place that is above the ground

name: interest
trans: n. 兴趣 v. 使感兴趣

sentences.english: I watched the first few episodes, but soon lost interest.
sentences.chinese: 我看了前几集，但很快就失去了兴趣。

sentences.english: The last round of bidding aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 最后一轮竞价引起人们相当大的兴趣。

sentences.english: Our survey reveals a disturbing lack of interest in teacher training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的调查显示人们对教师培训失去了兴趣，这很令人不安。

sentences.english: I read your article with great interest.
sentences.chinese: 我兴致勃勃地拜读了您的文章。

sentences.english: to promote/protect/safeguard sb's interests
sentences.chinese: 为某人的利益游说；保护 / 维护某人的利益

sentences.english: The money was repaid with interest.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱是带息偿还的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you have when you want to know or learn more about sb/sth

name: junior
trans: adj. 初级的n. 青少年

sentences.english: She now lives with actor Denis Lawson, 10 years her junior.
sentences.chinese: 她现在和比她小10岁的演员丹尼斯·劳森同居。

detailed_translations.english: If you are someone's junior, you are younger than they are

sentences.english: That’s an interesting question.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个有趣的问题。

sentences.english: a really interesting TV programme
sentences.chinese: 十分有趣的电视节目

sentences.english: Did you meet any interesting people?
sentences.chinese: 你见过什么有意思的人吗？

sentences.english: It’s interesting that no one remembers seeing the car.
sentences.chinese: 竟然没人记得见过这辆车，真是有趣。

detailed_translations.english: attracting your attention because it is special, exciting or unusual

sentences.english: A good strong cup of coffee is just what I need right now.
sentences.chinese: 我现在正需要喝一杯浓浓的咖啡。

sentences.english: The house was large and roomy; just right for us.
sentences.chinese: 那幢房子大而宽敞，正合我们的需要。

sentences.english: She looks just like her mother.
sentences.chinese: 她看上去就像她妈妈。

sentences.english: It’s nothing serious – just a small cut.
sentences.chinese: 不要紧，只不过是个小伤口。

sentences.english: John’s just told me that he’s getting married.
sentences.chinese: 约翰刚刚告诉我他要结婚了。

detailed_translations.english: exactly

sentences.english: the response of the international community
sentences.chinese: 国际社会的反响

sentences.english: the UN and other international organizations
sentences.chinese: 联合国和其他国际组织

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving more than one nation

sentences.english: The noise kept him awake.
sentences.chinese: 噪音使他一直醒着。

sentences.english: I was struggling to keep awake.
sentences.chinese: 我努力不让自己睡着。

detailed_translations.english: to stay in a particular state, condition, or position, or to make someone or something do this

sentences.english: Do you have access to the Internet?
sentences.chinese: 你上得了网吗？

detailed_translations.english: a computer system that allows millions of computer users around the world to exchange information

sentences.english: A bunch of keys hung from his belt.
sentences.chinese: 他的皮带上挂着一串钥匙。

sentences.english: Press the ‘Escape’ key to exit.
sentences.chinese: 按退出键退出。

sentences.english: Check your answers in the key at the back of the book.
sentences.chinese: 用书后的解答核对答案。

detailed_translations.english: a small specially shaped piece of metal that you put into a lock and turn in order to lock or unlock a door, start a car etc

sentences.english: Will you stop interrupting me!
sentences.chinese: 别打断我的话！

sentences.english: Sorry to interrupt, but I need to ask you to come downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉打扰了，我得请你下楼来。

detailed_translations.english: to stop someone from continuing what they are saying or doing by suddenly speaking to them, making a noise etc

sentences.english: a computer keyboard
sentences.chinese: 计算机键盘

detailed_translations.english: a board with buttons marked with letters or numbers that are pressed to put information into a computer or other machine

detailed_translations.chinese: 键入；用键盘式排字机排字
detailed_translations.english: to put information into a computer, using a keyboard

sentences.english: a portfolio of work presented at interview
sentences.chinese: 在面试时呈递的工作成果样本

sentences.english: a police interview
sentences.chinese: 警方问讯

sentences.english: We’re interviewing six candidates for the job.
sentences.chinese: 这份工作我们要面试六名申请人。

detailed_translations.english: a formal meeting at which someone is asked questions in order to find out whether they are suitable for a job, course of study etc
to ask someone questions during an interview

sentences.english: He kicked the door hard.
sentences.chinese: 他用力踢门。

sentences.english: The boys were kicking a ball around in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在院子里踢球。

sentences.english: She gave him a kick on the shin.
sentences.chinese: 她朝他的小腿踢了一脚。

detailed_translations.english: to hit sb/sth with your foot
a movement with the foot or the leg, usually to hit sth with the foot

sentences.english: Come into the office.
sentences.chinese: 到办公室里来。

sentences.english: He thrust his hand into his coat pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他把手插进大衣口袋里。

sentences.english: There must be another way into the cave.
sentences.chinese: 一定有其他的路可以进入洞穴。

sentences.english: Sue got back into bed and pulled the quilt over her head.
sentences.chinese: 休回到床上，拉过被子蒙住头。

sentences.english: I’ve got to go into town this morning.
sentences.chinese: 我今天上午得进城去。

sentences.english: We dived into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我们跳进海里。

detailed_translations.english: to the inside or inner part of a container, place, area etc

sentences.english: She’d always loved animals since she was a little kid.
sentences.chinese: 她从小就喜爱动物。

sentences.english: He’s married with three kids.
sentences.chinese: 他已婚，有三个孩子。

sentences.english: A neighbor volunteered to keep an eye on the kids (= their children or the children they are responsible for ).
sentences.chinese: 一位邻居主动来照看这些小孩。

sentences.english: college kids
sentences.chinese: 大学生

detailed_translations.english: a child

sentences.english: Several senators introduced legislation aimed at sexual harassment.
sentences.chinese: 几位参议员提交了针对性骚扰的立法议案。

detailed_translations.english: to formally present a possible new law to be discussed

sentences.english: Why did she kill her husband?
sentences.chinese: 她为什么杀死丈夫？

sentences.english: Murray held a gun to his head and threatened to kill him.
sentences.chinese: 默里拿枪指着他的头并威胁要杀了他。

sentences.english: Four people were killed when a train plunged into a flooded river.
sentences.chinese: 火车冲进洪水泛滥的河中，造成四人身亡。

sentences.english: Bleach kills household germs.
sentences.chinese: 漂白剂能够杀灭日常病菌。

sentences.english: Smoking kills.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟会致人死亡。

sentences.english: The out-of-town shopping centre will kill local trade.
sentences.chinese: 城外的购物中心将令本地商业难以为继。

sentences.english: With time to kill, he took a cab to the centre.
sentences.chinese: 还有点时间可以消磨，于是他叫了一辆出租车去市中心。

detailed_translations.english: to make a person or animal die

sentences.english: Pete, are you going to make the introductions?
sentences.chinese: 皮特，你来作一下介绍吧。

sentences.english: Our first contestant needs no introduction (= everyone already knows the person ).
sentences.chinese: 我们的第一位参赛者就不用介绍了。

sentences.english: the introduction of Buddhism to China nearly 2,000 years ago
sentences.chinese: 约2,000年前佛教传入中国

sentences.english: In the introduction, he explains why he wrote the book.
sentences.chinese: 在引言里，他解释了写这本书的原因。

detailed_translations.english: the act of formally telling two people each other’s names when they first meet

sentences.english: I'd like a kilo of pasta.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一千克的意大利面。

sentences.english: The Asians obliged, air-shipping some of their kilo bars and gold bangles to refineries in Switzerland for recasting back into 400 oz bars.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲人满足他们，将一部分以千克为单位的金条和金手镯空运至瑞士的精炼商，重新把它们加工为400盎司的金条。

detailed_translations.english: a kilogram

sentences.english: Alexander Graham Bell invented the telephone in 1876.
sentences.chinese: 亚历山大 · 格雷厄姆 · 贝尔于1876年发明了电话。

detailed_translations.english: to make, design, or think of a new type of thing

sentences.english: The invention of the computer has revolutionized the business world.
sentences.chinese: 电脑的发明使商界发生了根本变化。

sentences.english: They subsequently admitted that the story was pure invention.
sentences.chinese: 他们后来承认他们说的纯属虚构。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发明，创造；捏造， 假话
detailed_translations.english: the act of inventing something

sentences.english: He was a kilometre out from home when the storm struck.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨袭来时他离家有一公里远。

sentences.english: They ran to the main road and on for a kilometre until ambulances could reach them.
sentences.chinese: 接着他们就向大道跑去，到了以后再跑了一千米，直到碰到救护车。

sentences.english: Every cubic kilometre of the ring contains around 20 tiny particles of dust, making it so tenuous, it would be invisible from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 这个光环每立方公里含有约20颗尘埃微粒，结构非常稀薄，站在光环内部都看不见它本身。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring distance, equal to 1,000 metres

sentences.english: I’m afraid I wasn’t invited.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我没有受到邀请。

sentences.english: Successful candidates will be invited for interview next week.
sentences.chinese: 通过甄别的候选人将获邀于下周参加面试。

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone to come to a party, wedding, meal etc

sentences.english: Get me a sandwich – any kind will do.
sentences.chinese: 给我一份三明治，随便哪种都可以。

detailed_translations.english: one of the different types of a person or thing that belong to the same group

sentences.english: What will the job involve?
sentences.chinese: 这份工作包括什么？

sentences.english: I didn’t realize putting on a play involved so much work.
sentences.chinese: 我没想到上演一出戏剧需要做这么多的工作。

detailed_translations.english: if an activity or situation involves something, that thing is part of it or a result of it

sentences.english: On 2 December Henry VI was crowned king (= made the king at an official ceremony ).
sentences.chinese: 12月2日，亨利六世加冕为王。

detailed_translations.english: a man who rules a country because he is from a royal family

detailed_translations.chinese: 主要的，最重要的，最大的

sentences.english: I live on an island.
sentences.chinese: 我住在一个岛上。

sentences.english: Then one day, an English ship anchored near the island.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一天，一艘英国船在岛附近抛锚了。

sentences.english: This is because the island is so close to the equator. So you can choose to go whenever you like.
sentences.chinese: 就因为这个岛是如此接近赤道。所以只要你愿意你任何时候都可以去。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land completely surrounded by water

sentences.english: Maggie leaned forward and kissed her cheek.
sentences.chinese: 玛吉俯身吻了她的脸颊。

sentences.english: Georgina took him in her arms and kissed him on the lips.
sentences.chinese: 乔治娜抱住他，吻他的嘴唇。

sentences.english: Jim and Mary kissed (= they kissed each other ).
sentences.chinese: 吉姆和玛丽接了吻。

detailed_translations.english: to touch someone with your lips as a greeting, to show them love, or as part of a sexual relationship
to touch someone with your lips as a greeting, to show them love, or as part of a sexual relationship
an act of kissing

sentences.english: ‘Where’s your office?’ ‘It’s on the third floor.’
sentences.chinese: “你的办公室在哪儿？”“在三楼。”

sentences.english: I love the spring – it’s a wonderful time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢春季——这是一年里最美妙的时节。

sentences.english: There were people crying, buildings on fire. It was terrible!
sentences.chinese: 有人在哭喊，楼房在燃烧―太可怕了！

sentences.english: Don’t blame me. It wasn’t my idea.
sentences.chinese: 不要责备我，这不是我的主意。

sentences.english: This little beast is a lemur and it lives in Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 这小动物是狐猴，生活在马达加斯加。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a thing, animal, situation, idea etc that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: Sam went into the kitchen to make a pot of tea.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆走进厨房去沏一壶茶。

sentences.english: She is in the kitchen making a meal.
sentences.chinese: 她在厨房里做饭。

detailed_translations.english: the room where you prepare and cook food

sentences.english: He emphasized its importance to me.
sentences.chinese: 他向我强调它的重要性。

sentences.english: The child read the story but did not comprehend its meaning.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子读了这篇故事，但不能理解它的意思。

sentences.english: The company disseminated information about its new programmes.
sentences.chinese: 公司传播有关其新计划的信息。

sentences.english: She has a blue and green kite.
sentences.chinese: 她有一只蓝色和绿色的风筝。

sentences.english: The child tailed his kite.
sentences.chinese: 小孩儿给自己的风筝装了尾巴。

sentences.english: He tried to fly his kite.
sentences.chinese: 他试图放飞他的风筝。

detailed_translations.english: a light frame covered in coloured paper or plastic that you let fly in the air on the end of one or two long strings

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用空头支票；像风筝一样飞；轻快地移动

sentences.english: The cat lay on the sofa, washing itself.
sentences.chinese: 猫躺在沙发上把自己舔干。

sentences.english: The machine switches itself off when the process is complete.
sentences.chinese: 工作程序结束，机器会自动关闭。

sentences.english: a small local enterprise that has transformed itself into a highly successful company
sentences.chinese: 已发展为业绩喜人的公司的一家小型地方企业

detailed_translations.english: used to show that a thing, organization, animal, or baby that does something is affected by its own action

sentences.english: Lucy had a bandage round her knee.
sentences.chinese: 露西的膝盖上缠着绷带。

sentences.english: a knee injury
sentences.chinese: 膝伤

detailed_translations.english: the joint that bends in the middle of your leg
to hit someone with your knee

sentences.english: He unzipped his jacket.
sentences.chinese: 他拉开夹克衫的拉链。

sentences.english: The bitter wind cut through his jacket.
sentences.chinese: 刺骨的冷风吹透了他的夹克衫。

sentences.english: When I grew out of my jacket,I gave it to my little brother.
sentences.chinese: 我长得穿不下我的夹克衫了，便把它给我弟弟穿。

detailed_translations.english: a short light coat

sentences.english: a knife and fork
sentences.chinese: 一副刀叉

sentences.english: Some young people are carrying knives to defend themselves.
sentences.chinese: 一些年轻人带着刀子防身。

sentences.english: a kitchen knife
sentences.chinese: 厨房用刀

sentences.english: Use a sharp knife to cut the melon into sections.
sentences.chinese: 用快刀把瓜切成块。

detailed_translations.english: a metal blade fixed into a handle, used for cutting or as a weapon
to put a knife into someone’s body

sentences.english: We set sail from China for Japan.
sentences.chinese: 我们从中国启航驶往日本。

sentences.english: I knocked and knocked but nobody answered.
sentences.chinese: 我把门敲了又敲，但无人回应。

sentences.english: He got a nasty knock on the head.
sentences.chinese: 他头部遭到重重一击。

detailed_translations.english: to hit a door or window with your closed hand to attract the attention of the people inside
a sharp blow from sth hard

name: Japanese
trans: n.日本人,日语 adj.日本的

sentences.english: a Japanese car
sentences.chinese: 日本(汽)车

sentences.english: At least three British golf courses are now owned by the Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 现在英国至少有3家高尔夫球场为日本人所有。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Japan, its people, or its language
people from Japan

sentences.english: Who knows the answer?
sentences.chinese: 谁知道答案？

sentences.english: There are instructions telling you everything you need to know.
sentences.chinese: 操作指南会告诉你所有须知事项。

sentences.english: Didn’t you know that?
sentences.chinese: 你不知道那件事吗？

sentences.english: I know all about David and what he’s been up to!
sentences.chinese: 我对戴维和他一直在干什么都知道得一清二楚！

sentences.english: Let me know (= tell me ) what time you’re planning to arrive.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我你打算什么时候到。

sentences.english: I thought you’d want to know immediately.
sentences.chinese: 我以为你想马上知道。

sentences.english: If you must know, I was with James last night (= used when you are angry because someone wants to know something ).
sentences.chinese: 如果你非要知道的话，我昨晚是和詹姆斯在一起。

sentences.english: How did he know (= how did he find information about ) our names?
sentences.chinese: 他是怎么知道我们姓名的？

detailed_translations.english: to have information about something

sentences.english: ...a young man in jeans and a worn T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: …一个穿着牛仔裤和破旧T恤衫的年轻人。

detailed_translations.english: trousers made of denim(= a strong, usually blue, cotton cloth )

sentences.english: He did not have much knowledge of American history.
sentences.chinese: 他对美国历史所知不多。

sentences.english: Evans denied all knowledge of the robbery.
sentences.chinese: 埃文斯说他对这次抢劫一无所知。

detailed_translations.english: the information, skills, and understanding that you have gained through learning or experience

sentences.english: Do you enjoy your job?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢自己的工作吗？

sentences.english: It was the first paid job I ever had.
sentences.chinese: 这是我第一份拿工资的工作。

sentences.english: He’s been in the job for six years.
sentences.chinese: 他干这份工作有六年了。

sentences.english: I’m looking for a new job.
sentences.chinese: 我在找一份新工作。

sentences.english: Your pension can be affected if you change jobs.
sentences.chinese: 换工作的话，会影响到你的退休金。

sentences.english: Sam does odd jobs(= small jobs in the house or garden ) for friends and neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆为朋友和邻居打打零工。

detailed_translations.english: the regular paid work that you do for an employer

sentences.english: I go jogging every morning.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早晨都去慢跑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 慢跑；轻推；蹒跚行进；使颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to run slowly and steadily, especially as a way of exercising
a slow steady run, especially done as a way of exercising

sentences.chinese: 他虽然经验最少，却是最出色的老师。

sentences.english: He’s my least favourite member of staff.
sentences.chinese: 他是最不讨我喜欢的员工。

detailed_translations.english: smallest in size, amount, degree, etc.
less than anything or anyone else

sentences.english: I’m sorry, there isn’t a lock on the bathroom door.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，浴室门上没有锁。

sentences.english: The key turned stiffly in the lock.
sentences.chinese: 这把钥匙开锁不灵活。

sentences.english: a bike lock
sentences.chinese: 自行车锁

sentences.english: Did you lock the car?
sentences.chinese: 你把汽车锁好了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a thing that keeps a door, drawer etc fastened and is usually opened with a key or by moving a small metal bar
to fasten something, usually with a key, so that other people cannot open it, or to be fastened like this

sentences.english: My baby gets upset when I leave the room.
sentences.chinese: 我一离开房间宝宝就会不安。

sentences.english: Before leaving the train, make sure you have all your belongings with you.
sentences.chinese: 下火车前一定要带好随身物品。

sentences.english: Leave the motorway at Junction 7.
sentences.chinese: 请在七号交叉路口驶离高速公路。

sentences.english: My youngest boy has not left my side (= has stayed near me ) since his daddy was killed.
sentences.chinese: 我最小的儿子自从他爸爸死后就没有离开过我的身边。

detailed_translations.english: to go away from a place or a person
to go away from a place or a person

sentences.english: He was nursed in London.
sentences.chinese: 他是在伦敦长大的。

sentences.english: I trained to London.
sentences.chinese: 我乘火车到伦敦。

sentences.english: He hopped to and fro between London and Paris for the business.
sentences.chinese: 为了这笔生意他曾不停地往返于伦敦和巴黎。

sentences.english: She held out her left hand.
sentences.chinese: 她伸出左手。

sentences.english: a scar on the left side of his face
sentences.chinese: 他左脸上的伤疤

detailed_translations.english: your left side is the side of your body that contains your heart

sentences.english: a lonely old man
sentences.chinese: 一个孤单的老人

sentences.english: Don’t you get lonely being on your own all day?
sentences.chinese: 你整天独自一人不感到寂寞吗？

detailed_translations.english: unhappy because you are alone or do not have anyone to talk to

sentences.english: a young boy with skinny legs
sentences.chinese: 双腿干瘦的小男孩

sentences.english: She fell and broke her leg.
sentences.chinese: 她摔断了腿。

detailed_translations.english: one of the long parts of your body that your feet are joined to, or a similar part on an animal or insect

sentences.english: He longed to see her again.
sentences.chinese: 到那里去要多长时间？

sentences.english: She longed for the chance to speak to him in private.
sentences.chinese: 她渴望有机会和他私下交谈。

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much, especially when it seems unlikely to happen soon

sentences.english: A lemon is an acid fruit.
