sentences.chinese: 她拿起信读了起来。

sentences.english: Read the instructions carefully before you start.
sentences.chinese: 开始前要仔细阅读说明。

sentences.english: children who are just learning to read and write
sentences.chinese: 刚刚开始学习读和写的儿童

sentences.english: Her books are quite widely read (= read by a lot of people ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的书读者很多。

sentences.english: When I was young, I read every one of his books from cover to cover (= read all of something because you are very interested ) .
sentences.chinese: 我小时候，他的每一本书我都从头到尾一页不落地看过。

detailed_translations.english: to look at written words and understand what they mean
to look at written words and understand what they mean

sentences.english: You’re wrong, and I can prove it.
sentences.chinese: 你错了，我可以证明。

sentences.english: To prove his point (= show that he was right ) , he mentioned several other experiments which had produced similar results.
sentences.chinese: 为了证明自己的观点，他提到了另外几个结果相似的实验。

detailed_translations.english: to show that something is true by providing facts, information etc

sentences.english: Come on. Aren’t you ready yet?
sentences.chinese: 快点，你还没准备好吗？

sentences.english: When the doorbell rang he was ready and waiting .
sentences.chinese: 门铃响的时候，他已经准备好在等着了。

sentences.english: Why does it take you so long to get ready to go out?
sentences.chinese: 你外出怎么要准备那么长时间？

sentences.english: He's always ready to help his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他总是乐意帮助朋友。

detailed_translations.english: fully prepared for what you are going to do

sentences.english: Tea and biscuits will be provided.
sentences.chinese: 有茶水和饼干供应。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone or make it available to them, because they need it or want it

sentences.english: She had never seen a real live elephant before.
sentences.chinese: 她以前从未见过活生生的大象。

sentences.english: a coat made of real fur
sentences.chinese: 真皮大衣

sentences.english: Things don’t happen quite that easily in real life.
sentences.chinese: 现实生活中不会动不动就有这样的事情发生。

detailed_translations.english: something that is real is actually what it seems to be and not false or artificial

sentences.english: We have to show that publishing this story is in the public interest (= helpful or useful to ordinary people ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们必须证明刊登这篇报道有利于公众。

sentences.english: full public access to information
sentences.chinese: 公众对信息的充分知情权

sentences.english: Public opinion is gradually shifting in favor of the imprisoned men.
sentences.chinese: 舆论渐渐倾向于同情入狱的男子。

sentences.english: There was a public outcry (= expression of anger by a lot of people ) about the shooting.
sentences.chinese: 公众就枪击事件发出了强烈抗议。

sentences.english: Their activities have been hidden from the public gaze (= people’s eyes or attention ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的活动一直在避开公众的视线。

sentences.english: He is adored by his public.
sentences.chinese: 他深受支持者喜爱。

detailed_translations.english: relating to all the ordinary people in a country, who are not members of the government or do not have important jobs
ordinary people who do not work for the government or have any special position in society

sentences.english: In the first half they realise their boss is exploiting them and begin to understand the theory of surplus value.
sentences.chinese: 在前半部，工人们认识到他们的老板是在剥削他们，开始了解剩余价值理论。

sentences.english: I hope that as time goes on we will realise that it is important for us to talk openly about Aids, because it is the only way to make it appear normal, like cancer.
sentences.chinese: 我希望随着时间的推移，人们将认识到公开谈论艾滋病是一件重要的事情，因为这是唯一一条使它成为像癌症一样的正常疾病的途径。

sentences.english: The first edition was published in 1765.
sentences.chinese: 第一版于1765年出版。

sentences.english: They are publishing the dictionary on CD-ROM.
sentences.chinese: 那部词典他们将以光盘版的形式推出。

sentences.english: We love reading your letters and we try to publish as many as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们喜欢阅读大家的来信，并且会尽量刊登出来。

sentences.english: The latest unemployment figures will be published tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 最新的失业数字将于明天公布。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange for a book, magazine etc to be written, printed, and sold

sentences.english: Why don’t you tell us what really happened?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不把真相告诉我们？

sentences.english: Oliver’s not really her brother.
sentences.chinese: 奥利弗其实不是她弟弟。

sentences.english: I never know what he’s really thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我从来都不知道他的真实想法。

sentences.english: She seems unfriendly at first, but she’s really very nice.
sentences.chinese: 一开始她似乎并不友善，但其实她人很好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 真正地， 实际上； 很， 十分， 全然
detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about what actually happened or is true, rather than what people might wrongly think

sentences.english: Mom! Davey’s pulling my hair!
sentences.chinese: 妈妈! 戴维拽我的头发！

sentences.english: He gave her a sharp pull forward.
sentences.chinese: 他猛地把她往前一拉。

detailed_translations.english: to use your hands to make something or someone move towards you or in the direction that your hands are moving
an act of using force to move something towards you or in the same direction that you are moving

sentences.english: She has reason to feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她有理由感到内疚。

sentences.english: the human power of reason
sentences.chinese: 人类的理性

sentences.english: They reasoned that other businesses would soon copy the idea.
sentences.chinese: 他们推断其他企业也会很快仿效这个点子。

detailed_translations.english: why something happens, or why someone does something
to form a particular judgment about a situation after carefully considering the facts

sentences.english: Smacking is not an acceptable way of punishing a child.
sentences.chinese: 要惩罚孩子，不应该用打的方式。

sentences.english: He promised to punish severely any officials found guilty of electoral fraud.
sentences.chinese: 他承诺要严惩任何在选举中有欺诈行为的官员。

sentences.english: They deserve to be punished for putting passengers at risk.
sentences.chinese: 他们置乘客于危险之中，理应受到惩罚。

sentences.english: I felt I was being punished for what my mother had done.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得自己在为妈妈的所作所为接受惩罚。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone suffer because they have done something wrong or broken the law

sentences.english: All the children will receive a small gift.
sentences.chinese: 每个孩子都会收到一份小礼物。

sentences.english: Lee received 324 votes (= 324 people voted for him ) .
sentences.chinese: 李得到324票。

sentences.english: If you would like to receive further information , return the attached form.
sentences.chinese: 欲收到详细资料，请交回所附表格。

sentences.english: She isn’t well enough to receive visitors yet.
sentences.chinese: 她身体还不是很好，不能见客。

detailed_translations.english: to be given something

sentences.english: About 20 pupils study music here.
sentences.chinese: 大约20名小学生在这里学习音乐。

sentences.english: staff and pupils
sentences.chinese: 教职员工和学生

sentences.english: a star pupil
sentences.chinese: 一名优秀的小学生

sentences.english: a third-grade pupil
sentences.chinese: 一名三年级小学生

detailed_translations.english: someone who is being taught, especially a child

sentences.english: Irving’s most recent book
sentences.chinese: 欧文最新的书

sentences.english: recent research into the causes of cancer
sentences.chinese: 近来对致癌原因的研究

sentences.english: the recent past
sentences.chinese: 不久前

detailed_translations.english: having happened or started only a short time ago

sentences.english: A purple may be made by dyeing a blue over a red.
sentences.chinese: 红色染上蓝色便可成为紫色。

sentences.english: She had a purple dress on with a silver-white necklace.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一条紫色的连衣裙配着一条银白色的项链。

detailed_translations.english: a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue
having a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue

sentences.english: He has recently been promoted to Assistant Manager.
sentences.chinese: 他最近晋升为经理助理。

sentences.english: a recently published biography
sentences.chinese: 一部最近出版的传记

sentences.english: Jerry lived in Cairo until quite recently .
sentences.chinese: 直至不久之前杰里一直住在开罗。

sentences.english: More recently, he’s appeared in a number of British films.
sentences.chinese: 最近，他出演了多部英国电影。

detailed_translations.english: not long ago

sentences.english: The purpose of this meeting is to elect a new chairman.
sentences.chinese: 这次会议的目的是选出一位新主席。

detailed_translations.english: the purpose of something is what it is intended to achieve

sentences.english: It didn’t move, so she pushed harder.
sentences.chinese: 它一动不动，因此她加力去推。

sentences.english: I promised to push him on the swings for as long as he wanted.
sentences.chinese: 我答应他想在秋千上荡多久我就推多久。

sentences.english: shoppers pushing their grocery carts
sentences.chinese: 推着购物车的购物者

detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something move by pressing them with your hands, arms etc
to make someone or something move by pressing them with your hands, arms etc

sentences.english: I recommend the butter chicken - it’s delicious.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐黄油焗鸡，非常好吃。

sentences.english: Can you recommend a good lawyer?
sentences.chinese: 你能介绍一位好律师吗？

detailed_translations.english: to say that something or someone is good, or suggest them for a particular purpose or job

sentences.english: He put the coffee on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他把咖啡放在桌上。

sentences.english: Where did you put the programmes?
sentences.chinese: 你把节目单放在哪里了？

detailed_translations.english: to move something to a particular place or position, especially using your hands

sentences.english: According to official records, five people were killed last year near that road junction.
sentences.chinese: 据官方记录，去年有五人在那个路口附近丧生。

sentences.english: His record reveals a tough streak.
sentences.chinese: 他的经历说明他个性坚强。

sentences.english: Her husband made her record every penny she spent.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫要她把花的每分钱都记下来。

detailed_translations.english: information about something that is written down or stored on computer, film etc so that it can be looked at in the future
to write information down or store it in a computer or on film so that it can be looked at in the future

name: quality
trans: n. 质量 adj. 优质的

sentences.english: Much of the land was of poor quality.
sentences.chinese: 很多地的土质很差。

sentences.english: Use only high quality ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 只使用上等的材料。

sentences.english: the drug’s addictive quality
sentences.chinese: 毒品令人上瘾的特性

detailed_translations.english: how good or bad something is

sentences.english: The fashion world just keeps recycling old ideas.
sentences.chinese: 时装界就是不停地翻新旧观念。

detailed_translations.english: to use something such as an idea, writing etc again instead of developing something new

sentences.english: It’s about a page and a quarter.
sentences.chinese: 大概是一又四分之一页。

sentences.english: Cut the cake into quarters.
sentences.chinese: 把蛋糕切成四等份。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you in a quarter of an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们一刻钟之后见。

detailed_translations.english: one of four equal parts into which something can be divided

sentences.english: We painted the door bright red .
sentences.chinese: 我们把门漆成鲜红色。

sentences.english: a red balloon
sentences.chinese: 一个红气球

sentences.english: I like the way the artist uses red in this painting.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢画家在这幅作品中对红色的运用。

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of blood
the colour of blood

sentences.english: Queen Elizabeth
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白女王

sentences.english: the future queen
sentences.chinese: 未来的王后

sentences.english: the queen of diamonds
sentences.chinese: 方块Q，方块王后

detailed_translations.english: the female ruler of a country

sentences.english: The governor announced a new plan to reduce crime.
sentences.chinese: 州长宣布了一项降低犯罪率的新计划。

sentences.english: The helmet law should reduce injuries in motorcycle accidents.
sentences.chinese: 头盔法的实施应该能减少摩托车事故的受伤率。

sentences.english: Small businesses will need to reduce costs in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 小企业要想生存必须削减成本。

detailed_translations.english: to make something smaller or less in size, amount, or price

sentences.english: Can I ask you a question?
sentences.chinese: 我能问你个问题吗？

sentences.english: I’m afraid I can’t answer that question.
sentences.chinese: 我恐怕无法回答那个问题。

detailed_translations.english: a sentence, phrase or word that asks for information

sentences.english: In his speech, he referred to a recent trip to Canada.
sentences.chinese: 在他的讲话中，他提到了最近的加拿大之行。

detailed_translations.english: If you refer to a particular subject or person, you talk about them or mention them

sentences.english: That was quick! I thought you’d be another hour.
sentences.chinese: 很快啊！我以为你还要一个小时呢。

sentences.english: It’s probably quicker by train.
sentences.chinese: 乘火车可能会快一点。

sentences.english: Have we got time for a quick drink?
sentences.chinese: 我们有时间喝口东西吗？

sentences.english: What’s the quickest way to the station?
sentences.chinese: 到车站怎么走最快？

sentences.english: We stopped to have a quick look at the church.
sentences.chinese: 我们停下来迅速地扫了一眼教堂。

sentences.english: Three bombs went off in quick succession (= quickly, one after the other ).
sentences.chinese: 瞬间有三个炸弹连续爆炸。

detailed_translations.english: lasting for or taking only a short time

sentences.english: My refrigerator suddenly started kicking up yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我的冰箱昨晚突然出了故障。

sentences.english: The minute Tom came home he beelined for the refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆一回到家就直奔冰箱而来。

sentences.english: Letters have been pouring into the office complaining about this kind of refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 办公室连续收到大批信件抱怨这种电冰箱。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, shaped like a cupboard, used for keeping food and drink cool

sentences.english: We’ll have to be quiet so as not to wake the baby.
sentences.chinese: 我们得安静点，免得吵醒宝宝。

sentences.english: It’s a nice car. The engine’s really quiet.
sentences.chinese: 这车真好，发动机声音很小。

sentences.english: I’ll be as quiet as a mouse (= very quiet ).
sentences.chinese: 我会像老鼠一样悄无声息的。

sentences.english: It was a Sunday, about three o’clock, and the streets were quiet.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个星期天，三点钟左右，街上一片寂静。

detailed_translations.english: not making much noise, or making no noise at all

sentences.english: She asked him to leave, but he refused.
sentences.chinese: 她叫他走，但他不肯。

sentences.english: When he offered all that money, I could hardly refuse (= could not refuse ) , could I?
sentences.chinese: 他愿意给那么多钱，我怎么可能拒绝呢？

sentences.english: The town made a weekly collection of refuse.
sentences.chinese: 该镇每周收一次垃圾。

detailed_translations.english: to say firmly that you will not do something that someone has asked you to do
waste material that has been thrown away

sentences.english: I’m sorry. That’s quite impossible.
sentences.chinese: 我很抱歉，那是完全不可能的。

sentences.english: I felt quite bitter about it at the time.
sentences.chinese: 当时我对此感到相当痛苦。

sentences.english: Well, actually it requires quite a bit of work and research.
sentences.chinese: 呃，实际上这需要相当多的工作和研究。

sentences.english: I can see it quite clearly.
sentences.chinese: 我能清清楚楚地看见它。

detailed_translations.english: completely

sentences.english: We regret any inconvenience caused to our customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们对于给顾客造成的不便表示歉意。

sentences.english: It is with great regret that I must decline your offer.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，我不得不谢绝你的好意。

detailed_translations.english: to feel sorry about sth you have done or about sth that you have not been able to do
sadness that you feel about something, especially because you wish it had not happened

sentences.english: The rabbit disappeared in the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 那只兔子消失在树丛中。

sentences.english: At this time, a robust rabbit said: "No, or eat me !
sentences.chinese: 这时，一只健壮的兔子又说：“不，还是先吃我吧！

sentences.english: Mother rabbit told him that he was old enough to eat other food, but not keep pestering her to suckle.
sentences.chinese: 兔妈妈让他不要老缠着妈妈吃奶，他已经能够自己去吃些别的东西啦。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal with long ears and soft fur, that lives in a hole in the ground

sentences.english: The report seeks to relate the rise in crime to an increase in unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 报告试图把犯罪率上升和失业增加联系起来。

sentences.english: He later related the whole story to me.
sentences.chinese: 他后来给我讲了整件事的来龙去脉。

detailed_translations.english: if you relate two different things, you show how they are connected

sentences.english: I have quite a good relationship with my parents.
sentences.chinese: 我和父母关系很好。

sentences.english: the relationship between diet and health problems
sentences.chinese: 膳食与健康问题之间的联系

detailed_translations.english: the way in which two people or two groups feel about each other and behave towards each other

sentences.english: The rocket was launched from a space research base.
sentences.chinese: 火箭从一个太空研究基地发射升空。

sentences.english: a space rocket
sentences.chinese: 航天火箭

sentences.english: Interest rates rocketed up.
sentences.chinese: 利率飞涨。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle used for travelling or carrying things into space, which is shaped like a big tube
if a price or amount rockets, it increases quickly and suddenly

name: relative
trans: n. 亲戚 adj. 相关的

sentences.english: The relative merits of both approaches have to be considered.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法的相对优点都得考虑在内。

sentences.english: her opponent’s relative lack of experience
sentences.chinese: 她的对手相对来说缺少经验

sentences.english: You may think you’re poor, but it’s all relative (= you are not poor compared to some people ) .
sentences.chinese: 你可能认为自己很穷，但一切都是相对的。

detailed_translations.english: having a particular quality when compared with something else
a member of your family

sentences.english: She has just landed the lead role in their latest production.
sentences.chinese: 她刚在他们最新的作品中取得了主角。

detailed_translations.english: the character played by an actor in a play or film

sentences.english: Gentle exercise can relax stiff shoulder muscles.
sentences.chinese: 和缓的运动可以使僵硬的肩部肌肉放松。

detailed_translations.english: if you relax a part of your body or it relaxes, it becomes less stiff or less tight
to rest or do something that is enjoyable, especially after you have been working

sentences.english: I looked around the room.
sentences.chinese: 我四下看了看房间。

sentences.english: She nodded toward a man who was standing across the room (= on the other side of the room ) .
sentences.chinese: 她朝站在屋子另一头的一个男人点点头。

sentences.english: Someone was laughing in the next room (= the one beside the one you are in ) .
sentences.chinese: 隔壁房间有人在笑。

sentences.english: Here’s your key - room 348.
sentences.chinese: 这是你的钥匙——348号房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 房间；空间；余地；机会；房间里所有的人
detailed_translations.english: a part of the inside of a building that has its own walls, floor, and ceiling

detailed_translations.chinese: 为…提供住处；租房，合住；投宿，住宿；留…住宿
detailed_translations.english: to rent and live in a room somewhere

sentences.english: The refugees were allowed to remain in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 难民获准留在英国。

sentences.english: They were cleaning up the remains of their picnic.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在打扫野餐的残余物。

detailed_translations.english: to stay in the same place without moving away

detailed_translations.chinese: 残余； 残骸； 遗迹
detailed_translations.english: Theremainsof something are the parts of it that are left after most of it has been taken away or destroyed

sentences.english: They tied a rope around my waist and pulled me up.
sentences.chinese: 他们在我腰间系了一根粗绳子，把我拉了上去。

sentences.english: The man was coiling a length of rope.
sentences.chinese: 那人正在卷一段绳子。

detailed_translations.english: very strong thick string, made by twisting together many thinner strings
to tie things together using rope

sentences.english: Do you remember Rosa Davies?
sentences.chinese: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.english: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.chinese: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.english: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.english: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.english: I hope he remembers the wine.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他记得带酒。

detailed_translations.english: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past

sentences.english: a dozen red roses
sentences.chinese: 一打红玫瑰

sentences.english: A large bouquet of roses arrived on her desk.

sentences.chinese: 我们要是开车去，可以节省很多时间。

sentences.chinese: “我太累了。”她说。

sentences.chinese: 他说什么都不要相信。

sentences.english: The scarf flapped her face.
sentences.chinese: 围巾轻拂着她的脸。

sentences.english: She muffled her throat with a scarf.
sentences.chinese: 她用围巾围住脖子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth that you wear around your neck, head, or shoulders, especially to keep warm

sentences.english: She covered her face, rocking to and fro in her grief.
sentences.chinese: 她捂住脸，悲痛得身体不住地来回晃动。

sentences.english: The waves rocked the boat from side to side .
sentences.chinese: 波浪使小船左摇右晃。

sentences.english: Paul sat gently rocking the child in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 保罗坐着，轻轻摇晃怀里的孩子。

sentences.english: Jim rocked with laughter when he heard what had happened.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆听了发生的事情后笑得前仰后合。

detailed_translations.english: to move gently backwards and forwards or from side to side, or to make something do this
a type of popular modern music with a strong loud beat, played using  guitar s  and drums

sentences.english: His mother always used to pick him up from school.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲以前一直去学校接他。

detailed_translations.english: a place where children are taught
to train or teach someone to have a certain skill, type of behaviour, or way of thinking

sentences.english: She ran back to the classroom to get her schoolbag.
sentences.chinese: 她跑回教室去取书包。

sentences.english: I was straightening my schoolbag when you phoned me.
sentences.chinese: 你给我打电话时，我正在整理书包。

sentences.english: Mom, could you buy me a new green leather schoolbag?
sentences.chinese: 妈妈，你能为我买一个新的绿色皮书包吗？

detailed_translations.english: A schoolbag is a bag that children use to carry books and other things to and from school

sentences.english: As a kid he’d never share his toys.
sentences.chinese: 他小时候从不肯与人分享他的玩具。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone have or use something that belongs to you
one of the equal parts into which the  ownership  of a company is divided

sentences.english: Many leading scientists do not consider that science can give absolutely reliable knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 许多杰出科学家都不认为科学能够提供绝对可靠的知识。

sentences.english: the founder of modern science, Isaac Newton
sentences.chinese: 现代科学创始人艾萨克·牛顿

sentences.english: developments in science and technology
sentences.chinese: 科学技术的发展

detailed_translations.english: knowledge about the world, especially based on examining, testing, and proving facts

sentences.english: Sharks were circling around our boat.
sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼在我们的小船周围游弋。

sentences.english: Beware the sharks when you are making up your mind how to invest.
sentences.chinese: 当你决定如何投资时要提防诈骗者。

detailed_translations.english: a large sea fish with several rows of very sharp teeth that is considered to be dangerous to humans

sentences.english: He is a scientist of high prestige.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位有声望的科学家。

sentences.english: As a scientist,he disbelieves in Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.english: The scientist thirsts after an achievement.
sentences.chinese: 这名科学家渴望取得成就。

detailed_translations.english: someone who works or is trained in science

sentences.english: You could always ask Beth – she’s got plenty of money.
sentences.chinese: 你总是可以去问贝丝——她有很多钱。

sentences.english: I saw you talking to that girl. Who is she?
sentences.chinese: 我看见你和那个女孩子说话。 她是谁？

sentences.english: What did she say when you told her?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉她时她怎么说？

detailed_translations.chinese: 她（主格）；它（用来指雌性动物或国家、船舶、地球、月亮等）
detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: a pair of scissors
sentences.chinese: 一把剪刀

detailed_translations.english: a tool for cutting paper, cloth etc, made of two sharp blades fastened together in the middle, with holes for your finger and thumb

detailed_translations.chinese: 剪开；删除（scissor的第三人称单数）

sentences.english: Sheep were grazing on the hillside.
sentences.chinese: 羊群在山坡上吃草。

sentences.english: a sheep farmer
sentences.chinese: 养羊的农民

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal that is kept for its wool and its meat

name: score
trans: n. 分数, 比分 v. 得分

sentences.english: At half-time the score was one all.
sentences.chinese: 半场时的比分是一比一。

sentences.english: What’s the score?
sentences.chinese: 比分是多少？

sentences.english: Is anybody keeping score (= making a record of the score ) ?
sentences.chinese: 有没有人负责记分？

sentences.english: The final score was Southampton two, Leeds United nil.
sentences.chinese: 最后的比分是二比零，南安普敦队击败利兹联队。

sentences.english: The school’s test scores have not improved.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的考试成绩没有提高。

detailed_translations.english: the number of points that each team or player has won in a game or competition

sentences.english: shelves of books
sentences.chinese: 一层层书架的书

sentences.english: supermarket shelves
sentences.chinese: 超级市场的货架

sentences.english: the amount of shelf space available
sentences.chinese: 可用的货架空间

detailed_translations.english: a long flat narrow board attached to a wall or in a frame or cupboard, used for putting things on

sentences.english: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.english: He went on staring at the TV screen .
sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a television or computer where the picture or information appears

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽， 遮蔽； 放映， 播放； 审查， 甄别
detailed_translations.english: if something screens something else, it is in front of it and hides it

sentences.english: The sun was shining .
sentences.chinese: 阳光照耀。

sentences.english: The moon shone brightly in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 皓月当空。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发出光；反射光，闪耀；出类拔萃，表现突出；露出；照耀；显露；出众
detailed_translations.english: to produce bright light

detailed_translations.chinese: 光亮，光泽；好天气；擦亮；晴天；擦皮鞋；鬼把戏或诡计
detailed_translations.english: the brightness that something has when light shines on it

sentences.english: Jay stripped his clothes off and ran into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 杰伊脱光衣服奔入海里。

sentences.english: Most exports went by sea .
sentences.chinese: 大部分出口商品都走海路。

sentences.english: a little cottage by the sea
sentences.chinese: 一座海滨小屋

sentences.english: He spent over 30 years at sea .
sentences.chinese: 他在船上工作了30多年。

sentences.english: They stood side by side looking out to sea .
sentences.chinese: 他们并排站着眺望大海。

detailed_translations.english: the large area of salty water that covers much of the Earth’s surface

sentences.english: We'll ship your order to the address we print on your cheques.
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你预订的货物送到我们印在你单据上的地址。

detailed_translations.english: to send goods somewhere by ship, plane, truck etc
a large boat used for carrying people or goods across the sea

sentences.english: It was too dark to search further.
sentences.chinese: 天太暗，无法继续寻找。

sentences.english: The area was thoroughly searched .
sentences.chinese: 这一地区已被彻底搜查过。

sentences.english: I’ve searched high and low (= everywhere ) for my glasses.
sentences.chinese: 我到处找我的眼镜。

detailed_translations.english: to try to find someone or something by looking very carefully
an attempt to find someone or something

sentences.english: I have to wear a shirt and tie to work.
sentences.chinese: 我上班要穿衬衫打领带。

sentences.english: a check shirt
sentences.chinese: 格子衬衫

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers the upper part of your body and your arms, usually has a collar, and is fastened at the front by buttons

sentences.english: the effect on plants as the seasons start to change
sentences.chinese: 换季对植物的影响

detailed_translations.english: one of the main periods into which a year is divided, each of which has a particular type of weather. The seasons are spring, summer, autumn, and winter
to add salt, pepper etc to food you are cooking

sentences.english: The hatred in her voice shocked him.
sentences.chinese: 她语气中的仇恨让他震惊。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel very surprised and upset, and unable to believe what has happened

sentences.english: I was in the back seat and Jo was driving.
sentences.chinese: 我在后座，乔开车。

sentences.english: a 10,000-seat stadium
sentences.chinese: 万人体育场

sentences.english: People were shifting in their seats, looking uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 人们在座位上动来动去，看上去不大自在。

sentences.english: He waved toward a chair, and seated himself at the desk.
sentences.chinese: 他朝一把椅子一挥手，在桌旁坐了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can sit, especially one in a vehicle or one from which you watch a performance, sports event etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职
detailed_translations.english: If you seat yourself somewhere, you sit down

sentences.english: I sat down and took off my shoes and socks.
sentences.chinese: 我坐下来脱掉鞋子和袜子。

sentences.english: What size shoes do you take?
sentences.chinese: 你穿几号的鞋子？

detailed_translations.english: something that you wear to cover your feet, made of leather or some other strong material

sentences.english: Any proposal must be seconded by two other members of the committee.
sentences.chinese: 任何提案须有委员会其他两位委员附议。

detailed_translations.english: to formally support a suggestion made by another person in a meeting

sentences.english: Police shot one suspect when he pulled a gun on them.
sentences.chinese: 警方在一名嫌疑人拔枪指着他们时击毙了他。

sentences.english: Smith killed his wife, and then shot himself.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯杀死妻子，然后开枪自杀。

sentences.english: A woman was shot dead in an attempted robbery.
sentences.chinese: 一名女子在一桩未遂抢劫案中中枪身亡。

sentences.english: The guards have orders to shoot intruders on sight (= shoot them as soon as they see them ) .
sentences.chinese: 卫兵们奉命一见到有人闯入就开枪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 射击，射中；拍摄；发芽；使爆炸；给…注射
detailed_translations.english: to deliberately kill or injure someone using a gun
an occasion when someone takes photographs or makes a film

name: secret
trans: n. 秘密 adj. 秘密的

sentences.english: I can’t tell you. It’s a secret.
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你，这是个秘密。

sentences.english: It was no secret that the two men hated each other.
sentences.chinese: 这两个男人相互仇视，这算不得什么秘密。

sentences.english: Don’t worry. Your secret is safe with me (= I won’t tell anyone about it ) .
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我会替你保守秘密。

sentences.english: Your hair always looks so great – what’s your secret ?
sentences.chinese: 你的头发看起来总是很漂亮——你的秘诀是什么？

sentences.english: They kept their relationship secret from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩的关系瞒着父母。

detailed_translations.english: something that is kept hidden or that is known about by only a few people
known about by only a few people and kept hidden from others

sentences.english: a barber’s shop
sentences.chinese: 理发店

sentences.english: a fish-and-chip shop
sentences.chinese: 炸鱼薯条店

sentences.english: the local shops
sentences.chinese: 当地的商店

sentences.english: Shirley saw her reflection in the shop window.
sentences.chinese: 雪莉在商店橱窗里看到了自己的影像。

sentences.english: I’m just going down to the shops .
sentences.chinese: 我正要去商店。

detailed_translations.english: a building or part of a building where you can buy things, food, or services
to go to one or more shops to buy things

sentences.english: My secretary will fax you all the details.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会把所有的细节发传真给你。

sentences.english: the secretary of the tennis club
sentences.chinese: 网球俱乐部的干事

sentences.english: the Foreign Secretary
sentences.chinese: 外交大臣

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in an office typing letters, keeping records, answering telephone calls, arranging meetings etc

sentences.english: a short meeting
sentences.chinese: 一个短会

sentences.english: Morris gave a short laugh.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯笑了一声。

sentences.english: a short course on business English
sentences.chinese: 商业英语短期课程

sentences.english: Winter is coming and the days are getting shorter.
sentences.chinese: 冬天来临，白天变短了。

sentences.english: I’ve only been in Brisbane a short time .
sentences.chinese: 我才来布里斯班不久。

sentences.english: For a short while (= a short time ) , the city functioned as the region’s capital.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市曾经在很短的一段时间里是这个地区的首府。

sentences.english: I learned a lot during my short period as a junior reporter.
sentences.chinese: 在当初级记者的这段短暂时间里，我学到了许多。

sentences.english: Germany achieved spectacular economic success in a relatively short period of time .
sentences.chinese: 德国在相对较短的时间里取得了非凡的经济成就。

sentences.english: They met and married within a short space of time .
sentences.chinese: 他们从相识到结婚时间很短。

sentences.english: I promise to keep the meeting short and sweet (= short in a way that is good, especially not talking for a long time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会议开得简短不拖拉。

sentences.english: For a few short weeks (= they seemed to pass very quickly ) the sun shone and the fields turned gold.
sentences.chinese: 短短的几个星期里，阳光照耀，田野变成了一片金黄。

detailed_translations.english: happening or continuing for only a little time or for less time than usual
a short film shown in the cinema
to almost do something but then decide not to do it

sentences.english: The moment we saw the house, we knew we wanted to buy it.
sentences.chinese: 我们一看到这房子就知道我们要买。

sentences.english: He crouched down so he couldn’t be seen.
sentences.chinese: 他蹲下来好让别人看不见他。

sentences.english: Can I see your ticket, please?
sentences.chinese: 我能看看你的票吗？

sentences.english: I saw the offer advertised in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 我在报纸上看到这个减价的广告。

sentences.english: Have you seen Chris (= do you know where he is ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你见过克里斯吗？

sentences.english: The accommodation was so awful it had to be seen to be believed (= you would not believe it if you did not see it yourself ) .
sentences.chinese: 住宿条件太糟了，不是亲眼所见是不会相信的。

detailed_translations.english: to notice or examine someone or something, using your eyes

sentences.english: I like your shorts, Jake.
sentences.chinese: 杰克， 我喜欢你的短裤。

sentences.english: Where are my shorts?
sentences.chinese: 我的短裤在哪里？

sentences.english: Now I have a cool pair of shorts for riding.
sentences.chinese: 现在我就有了一条骑车时的酷酷短裤啦！

detailed_translations.english: trousers reaching the top of the thigh or partway to the knee, worn by both sexes for sport, relaxing in summer, etc

name: seem
trans: v. 好像, 似乎, 看起来

sentences.english: Ann didn’t seem very sure.
sentences.chinese: 安看来并不十分肯定。

sentences.english: It seems a foolish decision now.
sentences.chinese: 现在看来这是一个愚蠢的决定。

sentences.english: It seems like you’re catching a cold, Taylor.
sentences.chinese: 你好像感冒了，泰勒。

sentences.english: ‘So Bill’s leaving her?’ ‘ So it seems (= that seems to be true ) .’
sentences.chinese: “这么说来，比尔要离开她？”“好像是这样。”

detailed_translations.english: if something seems to be true, there are qualities or facts that make people think it is true

sentences.english: He shouldn’t be so selfish.
sentences.chinese: 他不该这么自私。

sentences.english: Why should anyone want to marry Tony?
sentences.chinese: 怎么竟然会有人意嫁给托尼？

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is the right or sensible thing to do

sentences.english: Karen had seldom seen him so angry.
sentences.chinese: 卡伦很少见他这么生气过。

detailed_translations.english: very rarely or almost never

sentences.english: The residents are being asked to shoulder the costs of the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 居民们被要求承担这笔修理费用。

sentences.english: They shouldered the boat and took it down to the river.
sentences.chinese: 他们把船扛在肩上抬到河里。

detailed_translations.english: to accept a difficult or unpleasant responsibility, duty etc

sentences.english: If you offer him another hundred, I think he’ll sell.
sentences.chinese: 如果你再加一百元钱，我想他会卖的。

sentences.english: He regrets selling all his old records.
sentences.chinese: 他后悔把所有的老唱片都卖掉了。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone in exchange for money

sentences.english: There’s no need to shout! I can hear you!
sentences.chinese: 用不着大声喊叫！我听得见！

sentences.english: ‘Watch out!’she shouted, as the car started to move.
sentences.chinese: “小心！”汽车开动时，她大声喊道。

detailed_translations.english: to say something very loudly
a loud call expressing anger, pain, excitement etc

sentences.english: Lyn sent some pictures of the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 琳恩寄了几张婚礼照片。

detailed_translations.chinese: [sent-sent] 送， 寄； 派遣， 打发； 发送； 发射
detailed_translations.english: to arrange for something to go or be taken to another place, especially by post

name: show
trans: n. 演出v. 展示, 表明

sentences.english: Think positively and show some determination.
sentences.chinese: 要往好的方面想，拿出决心来。

sentences.english: She had learned not to show her emotions .
sentences.chinese: 她早就学会了不流露出自己的感情。

sentences.english: It was the sound a man might make when in pain but trying not to show it.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个人强忍着疼痛不愿表露出来时发出的声音。

sentences.english: Mary showed great interest in the children.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽对这些小孩子表示出极大的兴趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 显现， 显露， 露面； 演出， 放映
detailed_translations.english: to let your feelings, attitudes, or personal qualities be clearly seen

detailed_translations.chinese: 表演，节目；演出，上映；展览，展览物，展览会；显示，展示；表面，外观
detailed_translations.english: a performance for the public, especially one that includes singing, dancing, or jokes

detailed_translations.chinese: 给看，显示，出示；引领，带领；教，告知，说明；表明，证明
detailed_translations.english: to let someone see something

name: sense
trans: n. 感觉 v. 感觉到

sentences.english: Cats have a very acute sense of hearing (= very good, so that they can hear even the smallest sound ) .
sentences.chinese: 猫的听觉非常敏锐。

sentences.english: Employees need the sense of being appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 雇员需要被赏识的感觉。

sentences.english: It was dark and he had completely lost his sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 天黑了，他完全失去了方向感。

sentences.english: This is true in a general sense.
sentences.chinese: 从一般意义上来讲，这是对的。

sentences.english: Perhaps he sensed your distrust.
sentences.chinese: 也许他感觉到了你的不信任。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感官；感觉；理解力；判断力；意义
detailed_translations.english: one of the five natural powers of sight, hearing, feeling, taste, and smell, that give us information about the things around us
if you sense something, you feel that it exists or is true, without being told or having proof

sentences.english: Why does the phone always ring when I’m in the shower?
sentences.chinese: 为什么电话铃总是在我洗澡的时候响？

sentences.english: I’d like to use the shower if that’s all right.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以的话，我想用一下这里的淋浴。

sentences.english: The bathroom has a separate shower cubicle (= a shower in a separate part of the room ) .
sentences.chinese: 卫生间里有一个独立的淋浴间。

sentences.english: I need a shower.
sentences.chinese: 我需要洗个淋浴。

sentences.english: Mike shaved and showered.
sentences.chinese: 迈克刮了脸，冲了个淋浴。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that you stand under to wash your whole body
to wash your whole body while standing under a shower

sentences.english: She received an eight-year prison sentence.
sentences.chinese: 她被判八年徒刑。

sentences.english: He has just begun a life sentence for murder.
sentences.chinese: 他犯了谋杀罪，刚开始服无期徒刑。

sentences.english: Sanchez was sentenced to three years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 桑切斯被判了三年监禁。

detailed_translations.english: a punishment that a judge gives to someone who is guilty of a crime
if a judge sentences someone who is guilty of a crime, they give them a punishment

sentences.english: Shut the window, Ellen!
sentences.chinese: 埃伦，把窗关上！

sentences.english: I heard his bedroom door shut.
sentences.chinese: 我听到他的卧室门关上了。

sentences.english: She lay down on her bed and shut her eyes .
sentences.chinese: 她在床上躺下，闭上眼睛。

sentences.english: He shut the drawer and turned the key.
sentences.chinese: 他关上抽屉，转动了钥匙。

detailed_translations.english: to close something, or to become closed
not open

sentences.english: The gym and the sauna are in separate buildings.
sentences.chinese: 健身房和桑拿浴室在不同的大楼里。

detailed_translations.english: not joined to or touching something else

sentences.english: He was a quiet shy man.
sentences.chinese: 他是个话不多、害羞的男人。

sentences.english: a shy smile
sentences.chinese: 羞怯的微笑

sentences.english: As a teenager, I was painfully shy (= extremely shy ) .

sentences.chinese: 基础服务部门

name: several
trans: det. 几个 adj. 几个的

sentences.chinese: 我有几个建议。

sentences.chinese: 我有几个方法。

sentences.chinese: “一小时后向我报告，中士。”“是，长官。”

sentences.chinese: 珍妮特和阿比是两姐妹。

sentences.chinese: 她把植物周围的土壤弄湿。

to make something dirty, especially with waste from your body

sentences.chinese: 议会大楼位于一个大广场上。

sentences.chinese: 他有一台电脑放在书桌上，但他不用。

sentences.chinese: 我的登山靴在橱柜里，一直没有穿。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a particular position or condition

sentences.chinese: 战斗中，有一名英国士兵受了伤。

sentences.chinese: 房子位于林木茂密的小山坡上，环境十分优美。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一些；某个；大约；相当多的
一些；若干；其中的一部分；（数量不确切时用）有些人
detailed_translations.english: a number of people or things or an amount of something, when the exact number or amount is not stated
a fairly large number or amount of something

sentences.english: The children skated on the frozen pond.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在结冰的池塘上滑冰。

detailed_translations.english: to move on skates
one of a pair of boots with metal blades on the bottom, for moving quickly on ice

sentences.english: There’s somebody waiting to see you.
sentences.chinese: 有人等着要见你。

sentences.english: Somebody’s car alarm kept me awake all night.
sentences.chinese: 不知谁的汽车警报器吵得我整晚都无法入睡。

sentences.english: ‘Who can we get to babysit?’ ‘I’ll call Suzie or somebody .’
sentences.chinese: “我们能请谁来看小孩呢？”“我会叫苏齐或别的什么人。”

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a person, when you do not know, or do not say who the person is

sentences.english: ski slopes
sentences.chinese: 滑雪坡

sentences.english: a ski resort (= where people can go skiing )
sentences.chinese: 滑雪度假胜地

sentences.english: ...the Swiss ski resort of Klosters.
sentences.chinese: …瑞士的克洛斯特斯滑雪胜地。

sentences.english: ...a private ski instructor.
sentences.chinese: …一位私人滑雪教练。

detailed_translations.english: one of a pair of long thin narrow pieces of wood or plastic that you fasten to your boots and use for moving on snow or on water
to move on skis for sport or in order to travel on snow or water
You use ski to refer to things that are concerned with skiing

sentences.english: What would you do if someone tried to rob you in the street?
sentences.chinese: 要是有人在街上抢劫你，你会怎么办？

sentences.english: Will someone please explain what’s going on?
sentences.chinese: 谁能说说是怎么回事？

sentences.english: Have Brooks or someone fax this to New York right away.
sentences.chinese: 叫布鲁克斯或谁立刻把这个发传真到纽约。

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a person, when you do not know or do not say who the person is

sentences.english: Reading and writing are two different skills.
sentences.chinese: 阅读和写作是两种不同的技能。

sentences.english: Many jobs today require computer skills.
sentences.chinese: 如今的许多工作都需要计算机技能。

detailed_translations.english: an ability to do something well, especially because you have learned and practised it

sentences.english: There’s something in my eye.
sentences.chinese: 我眼睛里有什么东西。

sentences.english: Sarah said something about coming over later.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉说她等一会儿过来什么的。

sentences.english: I don’t know what he does exactly, but I know it has something to do with computers (= is related to them in some way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他具体是干什么的，只知道和电脑有关。

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a particular thing when you do not know its name or do not know exactly what it is

detailed_translations.chinese: 重要的人；值得重视的事

sentences.english: She wore a white blouse and a plain black skirt.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着白衬衣和纯黑的裙子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of outer clothing worn by women and girls, which hangs down from the waist like the bottom part of a dress
to avoid talking about an important subject, especially because it is difficult or embarrassing – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: I sometimes have to work late.
sentences.chinese: 我有时得工作到很晚。

sentences.english: Sometimes, Grandma would tell us stories about her childhood in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，祖母会跟我们讲讲她儿时在意大利的经历。

sentences.english: ‘Do you ever wish you were back in Japan?’ ‘Sometimes. Not very often.’
sentences.chinese: “你有没有想过希望回到日本？”“有时候吧，但不经常这么想。”

sentences.english: The journey takes an hour, sometimes even longer.
sentences.chinese: 路上需要一小时，有时甚至更长。

detailed_translations.english: on some occasions but not always

sentences.english: The sky grew dark, and a cold rain began to fall.
sentences.chinese: 天色转暗，开始下起冰冷的雨来。

sentences.english: A shooting star sped across the sky.
sentences.chinese: 一颗流星划过天空。

detailed_translations.english: the space above the earth where clouds and the sun and stars appear

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…投向空中；把…挂得过高

sentences.english: My wallet must be around here somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 我的钱包肯定是在这里的什么地方。

sentences.english: We could meet for dinner at Giorgio’s or somewhere (= or a similar place ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在乔治家或别的什么地方一起吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: in or to a place, but you do not say or know exactly where

sentences.english: I usually sleep on my back.
sentences.chinese: 我一般仰卧着睡觉。

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: He’s lucky because at least he has somewhere to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 他算是幸运的，至少还有个睡觉的地方。

detailed_translations.english: to rest your mind and body, usually at night when you are lying in bed with your eyes closed
the natural state of resting your mind and body, usually at night

sentences.english: Her son Sean was born in 1983.
sentences.chinese: 她的儿子肖恩出生于 1983 年。

sentences.english: They have three sons and a daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他们有三个儿子和一个女儿。

sentences.english: In those days, the property went to the oldest son.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，财产由长子继承。

sentences.english: their youngest son, George
sentences.chinese: 他们最小的儿子乔治

detailed_translations.chinese: 儿子；孩子（对年轻人的称呼）；男性后裔
detailed_translations.english: someone’s male child

sentences.english: The warmth from the fire made her feel sleepy.
sentences.chinese: 暖洋洋的炉火使她昏昏欲睡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 欲睡的；困乏的；不活跃的
detailed_translations.english: tired and ready to sleep

sentences.english: We used to listen to pop songs on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我们以前常常听收音机里播放的流行歌曲。

sentences.english: They sat round with guitars, singing folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 他们弹着吉他围坐在一起唱民歌。

sentences.english: ...dance, music, mime, and song.
sentences.chinese: …舞蹈、音乐、哑剧和歌唱。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of music with words that you sing

sentences.english: a slim young woman
sentences.chinese: 身材苗条的年轻女子

sentences.english: a slim waist
sentences.chinese: 纤腰

detailed_translations.chinese: 苗条的；修长的；微小的；差的

to make yourself thinner by eating less, taking a lot of exercise etc

detailed_translations.chinese: (Slim)人名；(阿拉伯)萨利姆；(英、西)斯利姆

sentences.english: It will be dark soon.
sentences.chinese: 天很快就要黑了。

sentences.english: David arrived sooner than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 戴维到得比我预料的快。

sentences.english: ‘Who?’ ‘You’ll find out soon enough (= fairly soon ) .’
sentences.chinese: “谁？”“你很快就会知道的。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 快；不久，一会儿；立刻；宁愿
detailed_translations.english: in a short time from now, or a short time after something else happens

sentences.english: The car was travelling at a very slow speed.
sentences.chinese: 汽车正以非常慢的速度行驶。

sentences.english: a slow walker
sentences.chinese: 慢慢走着的人

sentences.english: The economy faces a year of slower growth.
sentences.chinese: 经济将面临增长更缓慢的一年。

sentences.english: Take a few deep, slow breaths.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢地深吸几口气。

sentences.chinese: 我开始走得越来越慢。

detailed_translations.english: not moving, being done, or happening quickly
In informal English, slower is used to mean "at a slower speed" and slowest is used to mean "at the slowest speed." In nonstandard English, slow is used to mean "with little speed."

sentences.chinese: 我喉咙疼，四肢酸痛。

sentences.english: Mac’s still sore because I didn’t invite him.
sentences.chinese: 马克还在因为我没邀请他而生气呢。

sentences.english: They were starving and covered with sores.
sentences.chinese: 他们在挨饿，身上长满了疮。

detailed_translations.english: a part of your body that is sore is painful, because of infection or because you have used a muscle too much
a painful, often red, place on your body caused by a wound or infection

sentences.english: a small piece of paper
sentences.chinese: 一小片纸

sentences.english: a small car
sentences.chinese: 一辆小汽车

sentences.english: a small town
sentences.chinese: 小镇

sentences.english: a small dark woman
sentences.chinese: 一个皮肤黝黑的小个子女人

sentences.chinese: 这件 T 恤衫他穿太小了。

sentences.chinese: 这羊毛衫有三个尺寸: 小号、中号和大号。

sentences.chinese: 只有相对少数的人受到了影响。

sentences.english: a small amount of money
sentences.chinese: 一小笔钱

sentences.chinese: 受雇担任高级职位的女性比例要小得多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 少的，小的；微弱的；几乎没有的；不重要的；幼小的
detailed_translations.english: not large in size or amount

sentences.chinese: 她对自己造成的麻烦感到很内疚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗憾的；对不起的，抱歉的

detailed_translations.chinese: 对不起，抱歉（表示委婉的拒绝等）

sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛被烟熏得发痛。

detailed_translations.english: to feel a sharp stinging pain in a part of your body

sentences.english: a sound understanding of money and banking systems
sentences.chinese: 对货币和银行业体制的透彻理解

sentences.english: a sound knowledge of English
sentences.chinese: 扎实的英语知识

sentences.english: He has sound grasp of European history.
sentences.chinese: 他对欧洲历史有着透彻的理解。

detailed_translations.english: complete and thorough

sentences.english: Can you smell something?
sentences.chinese: 你闻到什么气味了吗？

the quality that people and animals recognize by using their nose

sentences.chinese: 自制的番茄汤

sentences.chinese: 她的笑脸

an expression in which your mouth curves upwards, when you are being friendly or are happy or amused

sentences.chinese: 哪面是南？

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is at the bottom of a map of the world, below the Equator. It is on the right if you are facing the rising sun.
towards the south
in the south, or facing the south

sentences.chinese: 我不吸烟，酒也喝得不多。

sentences.english: Do you mind if I smoke?
sentences.chinese: 我抽烟你介意吗？

sentences.chinese: 他坐在草地上吸烟。

sentences.english: He admitted that he had smoked marijuana when he was a student.
sentences.chinese: 他承认在读书时吸过大麻。

sentences.english: a smoking chimney

sentences.chinese: 地里燃烧产生的烟雾飘到了附近的公路上。

sentences.english: a southern accent

sentences.english: Southern Italy

detailed_translations.english: in or from the south of a country or area

sentences.chinese: 她的皮肤摸上去又滑又凉。

sentences.english: a smooth pebble

sentences.chinese: 石阶被磨得光溜溜的了。

sentences.chinese: 她站了起来，抚平了自己的连衣裙。

detailed_translations.english: to make a rough surface flat and even
If you smooth something, you move your hands over its surface to make it smooth and flat

sentences.english: How much space is there on each disk?
sentences.chinese: 每张磁盘有多大容量？

sentences.chinese: 这树篱占了太多的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of an area, room, container etc that is empty or available to be used

sentences.chinese: 我赶紧吃了点零食。

sentences.english: Drinks and light snacks are served at the bar.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧里供应饮料和小吃。

sentences.english: snack foods like crisps and peanuts
sentences.chinese: 炸薯片和花生之类的小吃

sentences.chinese: 对不起，我抽不出时间。

sentences.chinese: 你有没有多余的盒子？

sentences.chinese: 你可以睡那间空着的客房。

sentences.chinese: 你手头有闲钱吗？

sentences.chinese: 我去看看是否还有空余的座位。

sentences.chinese: 啤酒销售量的下降使该行业出现产能闲置。

sentences.chinese: 一条蛇蜿蜒爬过我们的小路。

detailed_translations.english: an animal with a long thin body and no legs, that often has a poisonous bite

sentences.chinese: 我震惊得说不出话来。

sentences.english: He spoke very softly (= quietly ) .
sentences.chinese: 他说话声音非常轻柔。

detailed_translations.english: to use your voice to produce words

sentences.chinese: 我们进村的时候雪下得正大。

sentences.english: I could see footprints in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我看到雪地里有脚印。

sentences.english: The town was buried under three feet of snow.
sentences.chinese: 小镇被三英尺厚的积雪覆盖着。

detailed_translations.english: soft white pieces of frozen water that fall from the sky in cold weather and cover the ground
if it snows, snow falls from the sky

sentences.english: The keynote speaker (= main or most important speaker ) was Robert Venturi, the architect.
sentences.chinese: 主要发言人是建筑师罗伯特·文图里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲者；扬声器；说话者；说某种语言的人
detailed_translations.english: someone who makes a formal speech to a group of people

sentences.english: the snowy fields
sentences.chinese: 被雪覆盖的田野

sentences.english: one snowy January day
sentences.chinese: 1月里大雪纷飞的一天

detailed_translations.chinese: 下雪的，多雪的；被雪覆盖的；洁白无瑕的
detailed_translations.english: with a lot of snow

sentences.english: a special place in the classroom for reading
sentences.chinese: 教室里的阅读专区

sentences.english: No one receives special treatment.
sentences.chinese: 没有人享有特殊待遇。

sentences.english: Maria’s special recipe for apple pie
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚的苹果馅饼秘方

sentences.english: The good china was used only on special occasions .
sentences.chinese: 这些精美瓷器只在特殊场合使用。

sentences.english: Each village has its own special charm.
sentences.chinese: 每一座村子都有其独特的魅力。

detailed_translations.english: not ordinary or usual, but different in some way and often better or more important

sentences.english: The troops will not advance until ordered to do so .
sentences.chinese: 在接到命令之前，部队不会前进。

sentences.chinese: 卢克把它们卖了吗？如果是这样的话，那钱到哪里去了？

sentences.english: ‘Has he lost a fortune?’ ‘ So they say .’
sentences.chinese: “他输掉了一大笔钱吗？”“他们是这么说的。”

sentences.english: ‘Look – I’ve even cleaned the windows.’ ‘ So I see .’
sentences.chinese: “瞧，我把窗子也擦干净了。”“我看到了。”

sentences.english: Parents can withdraw their child from school if they so wish .
sentences.chinese: 家长要是愿意，可以让孩子退学。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer back to an idea, action, quality, situation etc that has just been mentioned
used to say that someone does something because of the reason just stated

sentences.english: He has to make a lot of after-dinner speeches .
sentences.chinese: 他经常要发表席后演说。

sentences.english: Collins gave the keynote speech (= most important speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 科林斯作了主题发言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲；讲话；[语] 语音；演说
detailed_translations.english: a talk, especially a formal one about a particular subject, given to a group of people

sentences.english: I got caught speeding on the A40 yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我在 A40 号干线公路上超速行驶被逮到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞驰，迅速前进，急行；加速；超速行驶
detailed_translations.english: to be driving faster than the legal limit
the rate at which something moves or travels

detailed_translations.chinese: 快速传送； 促进， 使加速
detailed_translations.english: to take someone or something somewhere very quickly

sentences.english: a long, straight road
sentences.chinese: 一条笔直的长路

sentences.english: Try to keep your legs straight.
sentences.chinese: 尽量把腿伸直。

sentences.english: Always lift with a straight back.
sentences.chinese: 提东西的时候，一定要把背挺直。

sentences.english: her long, straight black hair
sentences.chinese: 她又长又直的黑发

sentences.english: They sat down in a straight line .
sentences.chinese: 他们坐成一直溜儿。

sentences.english: The road was dead straight (= completely straight ) .
sentences.chinese: 那条路是笔直的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 直的；连续的；笔直的；正直的；整齐的；异性恋的
detailed_translations.english: something that is straight does not bend or curve

detailed_translations.chinese: 直接地；不断地；立即；坦率地
detailed_translations.english: in a level or correct position

detailed_translations.chinese: 直；直线；直男，直女，异性恋者
detailed_translations.english: the straight part of a  racetrack

sentences.english: How do you spell ‘juice’?
sentences.chinese: juice 怎么拼？

sentences.english: Pupils should know how to spell commonly used words.
sentences.chinese: 小学生应该知道常用词的拼法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拼，拼写；意味着；招致；拼成；迷住；轮值
detailed_translations.english: to form a word by writing or naming the letters in order
a piece of magic that someone does, or the special words or ceremonies used in doing it

sentences.english: a strange city
sentences.chinese: 陌生的城市

sentences.english: strange noises
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的噪声

sentences.english: Does Geoff’s behaviour seem strange to you?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得杰夫的行为反常吗？

sentences.english: She felt there was something strange about Dexter’s voice.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得德克斯特的声音有点奇怪。

sentences.english: Isn’t it strange how animals seem to sense danger?
sentences.chinese: 动物似乎能感觉到危险，这不是很奇怪吗？

sentences.english: It’s strange that we’ve never met before.
sentences.chinese: 很奇怪，我们以前居然从来没有碰见过。

sentences.english: For some strange reason, I slept like a baby despite the noise.
sentences.chinese: 很奇怪，不知为什么，尽管很吵闹，但我仍睡得很香。

sentences.english: Strange as it may seem, I actually prefer cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 听上去也许很奇怪，我竟然喜欢冷天。

sentences.english: That’s strange. I was sure Jude was right here a second ago.
sentences.chinese: 真奇怪，我肯定祖德刚刚还在这儿的。

sentences.chinese: 令人奇怪的是，四名受害者都是红头发的。

detailed_translations.english: not familiar because you have not been there before or met the person before

sentences.chinese: 这星期我没有能力花更多的钱了。

trans: n. 压力, 紧张v. 强调

sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.chinese: 动物园请游客提建议，给刚出生的大熊猫起一个名字。

sentences.chinese: 约翰逊对她提起了诉讼。

sentences.chinese: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.chinese: 父亲为我治疗一般的胃痛。

sentences.chinese: 发烧也能影响睡眠和做梦，胃痛也如此，这就是为什么有人相信睡前吃了辛辣的食物会做噩梦。

sentences.chinese: 天空蔚蓝，阳光明媚。

sentences.chinese: 地面是石头铺成的。

detailed_translations.english: a hard solid mineral substance

sentences.chinese: 温暖晴朗的一天

sentences.chinese: 艳阳高照的上午

sentences.chinese: 阳光充足的房间

sentences.chinese: 我希望明天天晴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的

trans: v. 停止 n. 车站

sentences.chinese: 别再扔那些石头了！

sentences.chinese: 在圣诞节期间，商店营业到很晚。

sentences.english: Sara had the task of preparing the agenda for meetings.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉的任务是准备会议议程。

sentences.english: I was given the task of building a fire.
sentences.chinese: 我分配到生火的任务。

sentences.english: the skills required to carry out these tasks
sentences.chinese: 执行这些任务所需要的技能

sentences.english: He soon realized the scale of the task he had undertaken .
sentences.chinese: 他很快就意识到他所承担任务的艰巨性了。

sentences.english: Our first task is to gather information.
sentences.chinese: 我们的首要任务是收集信息。

sentences.english: Monkeys can be taught to do simple tasks .
sentences.chinese: 猴子能被教会做一些简单的事。

sentences.english: They have the unenviable task of supervising the most dangerous prison in the country.
sentences.chinese: 他们有个令人头疼的工作，就是管理国家最危险的监狱。

sentences.english: Volunteers had the thankless task of distributing campaign leaflets.
sentences.chinese: 志愿者的任务是分发活动传单，吃力不讨好。

sentences.english: Trying to bring up a small daughter on your own is no easy task .
sentences.chinese: 独自抚养年幼的女儿不是件轻而易举的事。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that must be done, especially one that is difficult or unpleasant or that must be done regularly

sentences.english: Teachers have no choice but to take measures to protect themselves.
sentences.chinese: 教师们别无选择，只能采取措施来保护自己。

sentences.english: Our neighbours have just bought themselves a jacuzzi.
sentences.chinese: 我们邻居刚刚买了一个按摩浴缸。

sentences.english: The kids seem very pleased with themselves.
sentences.chinese: 那些孩子好像自得其乐。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that the people who do something are affected by their own action

sentences.english: Some birds have a highly developed sense of taste.
sentences.chinese: 有些鸟的味觉很发达。

sentences.english: She has such good taste.
sentences.chinese: 她的品位很高雅。

detailed_translations.english: the sense by which you know one food from another

sentences.english: I wish I had known then what I know now.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望那时我就知道现在所知道的一切。

sentences.english: It was then that I realised she’d tricked me.
sentences.chinese: 直到那时我才知道她骗了我。

sentences.english: He started his career in St Petersburg – or Leningrad as it then was.
sentences.chinese: 他在圣彼得堡——当时叫列宁格勒——开始他的事业。

sentences.english: They met in 1942 and from then on (= starting at that time ) they were firm friends.
sentences.chinese: 他们1942年认识，从那时起就一直是好朋友。

sentences.english: Silently she closed the door. Just then she heard a noise.
sentences.chinese: 她默不作声地关上了门。 就在那时，她听到有声响。

sentences.english: I was paid £1,000, which was a lot of money back then (= a long time ago when things were different ) in the 1950s.
sentences.chinese: 他们给了我1,000英镑，在20世纪50年代那可是一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外
detailed_translations.english: at a particular time in the past or future

sentences.english: The plane taxied to a halt.
sentences.chinese: 飞机滑行一段距离后停下来。

detailed_translations.english: if a plane taxis, it moves along the ground before taking off or after landing
a car and driver that you pay to take you somewhere

sentences.english: We could go back to my cottage and have lunch there.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以回到我的小屋去吃午饭。

sentences.english: Scotland? I’ve always wanted to go there.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰？我一直想去那儿。

sentences.english: Hold it right there and don’t move.
sentences.chinese: 就站在那里，不要动。

sentences.english: Can you pass me that wine glass there?
sentences.chinese: 你能把那个葡萄酒杯递给我吗？

sentences.english: Look, there’s that bookshop I was telling you about.
sentences.chinese: 看，那就是我跟你说过的那家书店。

sentences.english: Who’s that man over there ?
sentences.chinese: 那边的那个男人是谁？

sentences.english: It’s too far to drive there and back in one day.
sentences.chinese: 一天开车来回太远了。

sentences.english: Are we going to get there (= arrive ) before the banks close?
sentences.chinese: 银行关门之前，我们到得了吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 在那里；在那边；在那点上
detailed_translations.english: in or to a particular place that is not where you are
used to express satisfaction that you have been proved right or that you have done what you intended to do

sentences.english: Would you like a cup of tea or coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你想来一杯茶还是咖啡？

sentences.english: Do you take milk and sugar in your tea?
sentences.chinese: 你的茶里面要放牛奶和糖吗？

sentences.english: I’d like two teas and a piece of chocolate cake, please.
sentences.chinese: 我想要两杯茶和一块巧克力蛋糕。

detailed_translations.english: a hot brown drink made by pouring boiling water onto the dried leaves from a particular Asian bush, or a cup of this drink

sentences.english: Their car was bigger and therefore more comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 他们的车大些，所以更舒适些。

sentences.english: Progress so far has been very good. We are, therefore, confident that the work will be completed on time.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止进展十分顺利，所以我们有把握按时完成工作。

detailed_translations.english: as a result of something that has just been mentioned

sentences.english: She taught me fractions and counting.
sentences.chinese: 他教我分数和计算。

detailed_translations.english: to give lessons in a school, college, or university, or to help someone learn about something by giving them information

sentences.english: We all defer to her in these matters.
sentences.chinese: 在这些事情上我们都听她的。

sentences.english: Are these all yours?
sentences.chinese: 这些都是你的吗?

sentences.english: Bear these thoughts with you as you go out into the world.
sentences.chinese: 当你出去走入社会时你把这些思想牢记在心。

sentences.english: a primary school teacher
sentences.chinese: 小学教师

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to teach, especially in a school

sentences.english: Bob and Sue said they wouldn’t be able to come.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃和休说他们来不了。

sentences.english: Ken gave me some flowers. Aren’t they beautiful?
sentences.chinese: 肯送给我一些花。很漂亮吧？

sentences.english: They all want to come to the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 他们都想来参加婚礼。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about

sentences.english: black trousers teamed with a bright shirt
sentences.chinese: 配亮色衬衫的黑裤子

sentences.english: You can team up with one other class member if you want.
sentences.chinese: 例句：如果你愿意的话，可以找一个同学组成一组。

detailed_translations.english: to put two things or people together, because they will look good or work well together

sentences.english: a thick oak door
sentences.chinese: 一扇厚实的橡木门

sentences.english: a thick slice of homemade bread
sentences.chinese: 一片厚厚的自制面包

sentences.english: He was wearing thick glasses.
sentences.chinese: 他戴着厚厚的眼镜。

sentences.english: short thick fingers
sentences.chinese: 短粗的手指

sentences.english: thick wool socks (= socks that are heavy and warm )
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的羊毛袜子

sentences.english: If you want a thicker blanket, there are more here in the closet.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要更厚的毯子，这个柜子里还有。

sentences.english: The meat is done when the thickest part turns from pink to white.
sentences.chinese: 肉最厚的部分从粉红色变成白色，就说明熟了。

detailed_translations.english: if something is thick, there is a large distance or a larger distance than usual between its two opposite surfaces or sides

sentences.english: We want to encourage good teamwork and communication.
sentences.chinese: 我们要鼓励良好的团队合作和沟通。

detailed_translations.english: when a group of people work effectively together

sentences.english: a thin gold chain
sentences.chinese: 一条细细的金链

sentences.english: She’s only wearing a thin summer jacket (= a jacket made of light material ) .
sentences.chinese: 她只穿了一件薄薄的夏装外套。

sentences.english: two thin slices of bread
sentences.chinese: 薄薄的两片面包

sentences.english: The road was covered with a thin layer of ice.
sentences.chinese: 路面上覆盖着一层薄薄的冰。

sentences.english: The skin on the eyelids is the thinnest on the body.
sentences.chinese: 眼睑上的皮肤是人体最薄的皮肤。

sentences.english: NATO will continue to thin out its forces.
sentences.chinese: 北约将继续裁军。

sentences.english: NATO will continue to thin out its forces.
sentences.chinese: 北约将继续裁军。

detailed_translations.chinese: 薄的；瘦的；稀薄的；微弱的
detailed_translations.english: if something is thin, there is only a small distance between its two opposite sides or surfaces
Thin out means the same as
Thin out means the same as

sentences.english: Modern technology makes moving money around much easier than it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 现代科技使货币流动比以前便捷得多。

sentences.english: Advances in technology have improved crop yields by over 30%.
sentences.chinese: 科技的进步使庄稼产量提高了30%以上。

sentences.english: There have been major new developments in satellite technology.
sentences.chinese: 卫星技术有了重大的新发展。

sentences.english: Many people are unwilling to embrace new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不愿意接受新科技。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工艺学； 工艺， 技术
detailed_translations.english: new machines, equipment, and ways of doing things that are based on modern knowledge about science and computers

sentences.english: People say things they don’t mean when they are angry.
sentences.chinese: 人生气时就会口不择言。

sentences.english: It was a horrible thing to happen.
sentences.chinese: 发生这样的事情太糟糕了。

sentences.english: I plan to do all the things I’ve been meaning to do for ages.
sentences.chinese: 我打算去做我多年以来一直想做的事。

sentences.english: The first thing to do is to give them food and shelter.
sentences.chinese: 首要的事是给他们提供食物和住所。

sentences.english: That’s a terrible thing to say .
sentences.chinese: 这话说得太难听了。

sentences.english: Getting more American ideas into British business would be a good thing .
sentences.chinese: 将更多的美国式理念注入英国商界会是一件好事。

sentences.english: ‘I did no such thing ,’ he protested.
sentences.chinese: “我没干过这样的事。”他抗议道。

sentences.english: I know a thing or two (= a lot ) about dogs.
sentences.chinese: 我对狗所知甚详。

sentences.english: In a democracy, it is no bad thing to be able to compromise (= it is good, even though it may not seem good ) .
sentences.chinese: 在民主国家，能够妥协并非就是坏事。

detailed_translations.english: an idea, action, feeling, or fact that someone thinks, does, says, or talks about, or that happens

sentences.english: I thought I heard something.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我听到了什么声音。

sentences.english: He didn’t think anyone would believe him.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得没人会相信他。

sentences.english: Do you think I should call him?
sentences.chinese: 你认为我应该打电话给他吗？

sentences.english: For some reason, I keep thinking it’s Friday today.
sentences.chinese: 不知为什么，我总觉得今天是周五。

sentences.english: The recession lasted longer than anyone thought it would.
sentences.chinese: 谁也没有想到这次经济萧条会持续这么久。

sentences.english: Am I right in thinking that you have a brother?
sentences.chinese: 我想你是有个兄弟的，对吗？

sentences.english: I can’t help thinking that he’s made a mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我总觉得他弄错了。

sentences.english: Do you honestly think I would do something so stupid?
sentences.chinese: 你真认为我会做这么愚蠢的事吗？

sentences.english: We must start thinking in terms of reducing costs.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须开始考虑降低成本了。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular opinion or to believe that something is true
to think about a problem or question

sentences.english: I’ve got toothache .
sentences.chinese: 我牙痛。

sentences.english: I had terrible toothache all last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我一整夜牙疼得厉害。

detailed_translations.english: a pain in a tooth

sentences.english: Can I have a glass of water? I’m really thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 我能喝一杯水吗？ 我太渴了。

sentences.english: He’d been working in the garden and was very hot and thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在花园里干活，又热又渴。

sentences.english: All this digging is thirsty work (= work that makes you want a drink ) .
sentences.chinese: 这种挖地的活干了让人口渴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 口渴的，口干的；渴望的，热望的
detailed_translations.english: feeling that you want or need a drink

sentences.english: a low wooden table with a glass top
sentences.chinese: 玻璃桌面的矮木桌

detailed_translations.chinese: 顶部，顶端；上部；首席；陀螺
detailed_translations.english: the highest part of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 高出，超越；结束；达到顶点
detailed_translations.english: to be higher than a particular amount
nearest to the top of something

sentences.english: The table’s about this high and this wide.
sentences.chinese: 那桌子大约有这么高，这么宽。

sentences.english: You need to cut about this much off the end of the pipe.
sentences.chinese: 你要从管子头上切下大约这么多。

detailed_translations.english: used to say how big, how much etc, when you are showing the size, amount etc with your hands

sentences.english: The environment is a popular topic these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今环境是一个热门话题。

sentences.english: The main topic for discussion will be the proposed new supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 讨论的主要议题是拟建中的超级市场。

sentences.english: a wide range of topics
sentences.chinese: 广泛的话题

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目， 论题， 话题
detailed_translations.english: a subject that people talk or write about

sentences.english: He dotted down those notes.
sentences.chinese: 他匆匆记下了那些注解。

sentences.english: She ganged up on me with those rough boys.
sentences.chinese: 她伙同那些粗野的男孩对付我。

sentences.english: a total ban on cigarette advertising
sentences.chinese: 香烟广告的全面禁止

sentences.english: He looked at her with a total lack of comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 他一头雾水地望着她。

sentences.english: a sport that demands total commitment
sentences.chinese: 需要全身心投入的体育运动

detailed_translations.english: complete, or as great as is possible
to reach a particular total

sentences.english: Two heart attacks in a year. It hasn’t stopped him smoking, though.
sentences.chinese: 一年里心脏病发作了两次，可是那也没让他把烟戒掉。

sentences.english: It sounds like a lot of fun. Isn’t it rather risky though?
sentences.chinese: 听上去很有趣。可是这不是也很危险吗？

detailed_translations.english: used after adding a fact, opinion, or question which seems surprising after what you have just said, or which makes what you have just said seem less true
used to introduce a statement that makes the main statement coming after it seem surprising, unlikely, or unexpected

sentences.english: She reached out to touch his arm.
sentences.chinese: 她伸手去碰他的胳膊。

sentences.english: If your house has been burgled, you shouldn’t touch anything until the police arrive.
sentences.chinese: 如果家中被盗，在警察赶到之前不要动任何物品。

sentences.english: ‘Don’t touch me!’ she yelled.
sentences.chinese: “别碰我！”她大叫道。

sentences.english: Her plight has touched the hearts of people around the world.
sentences.chinese: 她的困境触动了全世界人的心弦。

sentences.english: She felt a gentle touch on her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 她感到有人轻轻碰了一下她的肩膀。

detailed_translations.english: to put your hand, finger etc on someone or something
the action of putting your hand, finger, or another part of your body on something or someone

sentences.english: It’s an interesting thought.
sentences.chinese: 这想法很有趣。

sentences.english: The thought that I might not have a job next year is a bit troubling.
sentences.chinese: 想到明年可能失业我有点心烦。

detailed_translations.english: something that you think of, remember, or realize

detailed_translations.chinese: 想，思考；认为（think的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: We met on a coach tour in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 我们是在意大利乘长途客车旅游时相识的。

detailed_translations.english: a journey for pleasure, during which you visit several different towns, areas etc

sentences.english: The singer complained of a sore throat after Wednesday’s show.
sentences.chinese: 星期三演出后，这位歌手说喉咙痛。

detailed_translations.english: the passage from the back of your mouth to the top of the tubes that go down to your lungs and stomach

sentences.english: Cambridge is always full of tourists in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 剑桥在夏季总是挤满了游客。

sentences.english: The Statue of Liberty is a major tourist attraction .
sentences.chinese: 自由女神像是主要的旅游景点。

sentences.english: What effect will this have on the local tourist industry ?
sentences.chinese: 这对当地的旅游业会有什么影响？

detailed_translations.english: someone who is visiting a place for pleasure on holiday

sentences.english: How many working days were lost through sickness last year?
sentences.chinese: 去年因为员工生病损失了多少个工作日？

detailed_translations.english: because of something

name: toward
trans: prep.朝, 面对; 趋向于

sentences.english: The bus stopped suddenly and we were all thrown forwards.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车猛地停住，我们都往前栽。

detailed_translations.chinese: [threw-thrown] 投， 扔， 抛； 使突然陷入； 使困惑， 使吃惊
detailed_translations.english: to make an object such as a ball move quickly through the air by pushing your hand forward quickly and letting the object go

sentences.english: the Eiffel Tower
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔

sentences.english: a castle with tall towers
sentences.chinese: 有高高的塔楼的城堡

sentences.english: He towered over his mother.
sentences.chinese: 他比他的母亲高出很多。

detailed_translations.english: a tall narrow building either built on its own or forming part of a castle, church etc
to be much taller than the people or things around you

name: thunder
trans: v. 打雷 n. 雷声

sentences.english: We were woken in the night by thunder.
sentences.chinese: 晚上我们被雷声惊醒。

detailed_translations.english: the loud noise that you hear during a storm, usually after a flash of lightning
if it thunders, there is a loud noise in the sky, usually after a flash of lightning
to make a very loud deep noise

sentences.english: an industrial town in the Midlands
sentences.chinese: 英格兰中部的一座工业城镇

sentences.english: I walked to the nearest town.
sentences.chinese: 我走到最近的镇上。

detailed_translations.english: a large area with houses, shops, offices etc where people live and work, that is smaller than a city and larger than a village

sentences.english: Slow down or you'll get a ticket.
sentences.chinese: 开慢点儿，否则你会接到一张罚款通知单。

sentences.english: parking/speeding ticket
sentences.chinese: 违法停车/超速行驶罚款单

detailed_translations.english: a printed note ordering you to pay money because you have done something illegal while driving or parking your car

sentences.english: some toys for the baby
sentences.chinese: 宝宝玩的一些玩具

sentences.english: Annie was playing happily with her toys .
sentences.chinese: 安妮正高兴地玩着玩具。

detailed_translations.chinese: 玩具；小装饰品；不值钱的东西
detailed_translations.english: an object for children to play with

detailed_translations.chinese: 玩弄；调情；随随便便地对待

name: tidy
trans: v. 整理 adj. 整洁的

sentences.english: a tidy desk
sentences.chinese: 整洁的书桌

sentences.english: I try to keep the garden tidy .
sentences.chinese: 我尽量保持花园整洁。

sentences.english: Ellen’s room is always neat and tidy .
sentences.chinese: 埃伦的房间总是非常整洁。

detailed_translations.english: a room, house, desk etc that is tidy is neatly arranged with everything in the right place
to make a place look tidy

sentences.english: They had to travel into town to trade the produce from their farm.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不到镇上去出售他们农场的产品。

sentences.english: We traded necklaces.
sentences.chinese: 我们交换了项链。

detailed_translations.english: to buy and sell goods, services etc as your job or business

sentences.english: He tied the ends of the plastic bag together.
sentences.chinese: 他把塑料袋的两头系在一起。

detailed_translations.english: if two players, teams etc tie or are tied in a game or competition, they finish it with an equal number of points

detailed_translations.chinese: 领带；平局；鞋带；领结；不分胜负
detailed_translations.english: a long narrow piece of cloth tied in a knot around the neck, worn by men

sentences.english: the traditions of South East Asia
sentences.chinese: 东南亚的传统

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property
sentences.chinese: 长子继承家产的传统

sentences.english: By tradition, it’s the bride’s parents who pay for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

detailed_translations.english: a belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time, or these beliefs, customs etc in general

sentences.english: He came at me like a tiger.
sentences.chinese: 他像老虎一般地向我冲过来。

sentences.english: Or tiger ?
sentences.chinese: 或者老虎？

detailed_translations.english: a large wild animal that has yellow and black lines on its body and is a member of the cat family

sentences.english: traditional Italian cooking
sentences.chinese: 传统的意大利烹饪

sentences.english: a traditional Irish folk song
sentences.chinese: 传统的爱尔兰民歌

sentences.english: a traditional method of brewing beer
sentences.chinese: 传统的啤酒酿造方法
